manzils.text: Twaa – Seen – Meem. (Mavara aya ndemamwe ezvishamiso zviri muQur’aan, uye hapana anoziva zvaanoreva kunze kwaAllah)
Idzi ndidzo ndima dzeGwaro riri pachena (Qur’aan iri, iro rakavimbiswa naAllah muTorah neVhangeri)
Zvimwe (Muhammad (SAW)) ungazviuraye nokuchema nokuti havazi vatendi (muIslaam)
Kana tichida, tinovatumira kubva kudenga chiratidzo icho chokuti huro dzavo dzinoramba dzakakotama (vachizvininipisa)
Uye yambiro haiuyi kwavari semashoko matsva kubva kumupi wenyasha, kusara kwekuti vanowafuratira
Asi zvirokwazvo vanoramba (chokwadi chemuGwaro reQur’aan), uye mashoko eizvo zvavaidzikisira (zvavaiseka) achauya kwavari
Havatarisi kune nyika here – zvingani zvatinoburitsa kubva mairi kubva kuchinhu chose chakanaka (chakakomborerwa)
Zvirokwazvo, mazviri mune chiratidzo, asi vazhinji vavo havatendi (muna Allah)
Uye zvirokwazvo, Tenzi vako, chokwadi ndivo vari pamusoro-soro, uye vane tsitsi zhinji (kupinda zvose)
Uye (rangarira) apo Tenzi vako vakadana Musa (vachiti): “Enda kune vanhu vanoita mabasa akashata.”
“Vanhu vaFarawo. Havatyi (Allah) here uye vova vanhu vakanaka?”
(Musa) akati: “Tenzi vangu! Zvirokwazvo, ndinotya kuti vangandiramba.”
“Uye hana yangu inhete (haina kusimba), uye rurimi rwangu runokakama. Saka tumirai kuna Haaroon (Aroni, kuti ave anoenda neni).”
“Uye vane mutongo wemhosva yangu, saka ndinotya kuti vangandiuraye.”
(Allah) vakati: “Kwete! Endai muri vaviri nezviratidzo zvedu. Zvirokwazvo, tichave tinemi tichiteerera.”
“Uye endai mose muri vaviri kuna Farawo monoti (kwaari): ‘Tiri vatumwa vaTenzi vepasi rose.’”
(Tatumwa kuti tikuudze kuti): “Titumire vana vaIzirairi tiende navo.”
(Farawo) akati: “Hatina kukuchengeta here pakati pedu uri kamwana? Ukagara nesu kwemakore mazhinji ehupenyu hwako.”
“Uye wakaita zvawakaita (zvekuuraya munhu), uye uri veavo vasingatendi.”
(Musa) akati: “Ndakazviita izvi ndichiri weavo vanhu vakarasika.”
“Saka ndakatiza kubva kwamuri nekuda kwekukutyai. Asi Tenzi vangu vakandipa mutongo (ungwaru uye nehuporofita), uye vakandiita umwe wevatumwa.”
“Urwu ndirwo rubatsiro rwavakandiitira kare rwaunondirangaridza, asi iwe uchiita varanda (nekudzvanyirira) vana vaIzirairi.”
Farawo akati: “Uye chii Tenzi vepasi rose (vanhu, nemaJinn nezvose zviripo)?”
(Musa) akati: “Tenzi vepasi nekudenga, nezvose zviri pakati pazvo, kana uchida kunyatsotenda.”
(Farawo) akati kune avo vakamutenderedza (makurukota ake anenge akagara navo samambo): “Muri kunzwa here zvaari kutaura?”
(Musa akataura) akati: “Tenzi venyu uye Tenzi vemadzitateguru enyu!”
(Farawo) akati: “Zvirokwazvo, mutumwa wenyu uyo atumirwa kwamuri anopenga (anorwara nepfungwa)!”
(Musa) akati: “Tenzi vekumabvazuva uye kumavirira (Madokero), uye zvose zviri pakati pavo, ndokunge kana muchinzwisisa!”
(Farawo) akati: “Kana mukatora umwe mwari muchisiya ini, zvirokwazvo, ndinokuita umwe wevasungwa.”
(Musa) akati: “Nyangwe ndakuvigira chinhu chiri pachena?”
(Farawo) akati: “Uya nacho, kana uri umwe weavo vanotaura chokwadi!”
Saka (Musa) akakanda tsvimbo yake pasi, uye nechinguva chisipi yakava nyoka mhenyu iri pachena
Uye akaburitsa ruoko rwake (kubva muhapwa), uye rwaivaima kune avo vose vaiona
(Farawo) akati kune makurukota akanga aripo akamutenderedza: “Zvirokwazvo, uyu munhu anoziva mapipi zvikuru.”
“Ari kuda kukubvisai munyika menyu nekuda kwemapipi ake, saka munoraira chii?”
Vakati: “Chimbomudzorera zvishoma nemukoma wake, uye wotumira vadaidzi kumaguta ese vachidaidza.”
“Kuti vakuvigire muzivi zvakanyanya wese wemapipi.”
Nokudaro vazivi vemapipi vakaunganidzwa nenguva yakatarwa pazuva rakatarwa
Uye zvakanzi kuvanhu: “Muchava munounganawo here?”
“Kuti tive tinotevera n’anga (vaiti vemapipi) kana vave vanokunda.”
Saka n’anga padzakasvika dzakataura kuna Farawo kuti: “Zvirokwazvo, tichave nomubairo here kana tave tinokunda?”
(Farawo) akati: “Hongu, uye muchave zvirokwazvo avo vanogara pedyo neni.”
Musa akati kwavari: “Kandai (tione) izvo zvamurikuda kukanda!”
Nokudaro vakakanda tambo dzavo uye zvitanda (tsvimbo) dazvo, uye vakati: “Nesimba raFarawo, zvirokwazvo tisu tichave tinokunda!”
Uye Musa akakanda tsvimbo yake (pasi), uye yakamedza zvose zvamanyepo zvavairatidza
Uye vaiti vemapipi vose vakabva vapfugama pasi
Vachiti: “Tinotenda muna Tenzi vepasi rose (vanhu, maJinn nezvose zviripo).”
“Tenzi vaMusa naHaaroon (Aroni).”

Farawo akati: “Munotenda maari ndisati ndakupai mvumo. Zvirokwazvo, uyu ndiye mukuru wenyu akakudzidzisai mapipi? Nekudaro zvirokwazvo, muchazvia zvenyu. Zvirokwazvo, ndichadambura maoko enyu uye makumbo enyu kumativi akapesana (ruoko rwerudyi negumbo rekuruboshwe kana kupindura), uye ndichakurovererai mose pamuchinjikwa.”
Vakati: “Hapana chakaipa! Zvirokwazvo, kuna Tenzi vedu tichava tinodzokera.”
“Zvirokwazvo, tinovimba kuti Tenzi vedu vachatiregerera zvitadzo zvedu sezvo tiri vekutanga kutenda (muIslaam uye muna Musa naHaaroon (Aroni)).”
Uye takave tinodzikisa kuna Musa kuti: “Famba husiku nevaranda vangu (kubva kuna Farawo), asi zvirokwazvo muchateverwa.”
Farawo akatumira vadani mumaguta ose
(Achiti): “Zvirokwazvo, vanhu ava kaboka kadiki.”
“Uye zvirokwazvo, vaita zvinhu zvatigumbura.”
“Asi zvirokwazvo, tisu tose takaungana nekuyambirwa.”
Saka takavadzinga kubva mumapindu uye zvitubu
Hupfumi, uye nzvimbo dzose dzakarurama
Nokudaro takaita kuti vana vaIzirairi vave vanogara nhaka yavo
Saka vakavatevera panguva yekubuda kwezuva
Mapoka maviri aya paakaonana, vanhu vaMusa vakati: “Zvirokwazvo, tava kuzobatwa zvino.”
(Musa) akati: “Hazviiti. Zvirokwazvo, Tenzi vangu vaneni. Vachava vanonditungamira.”
Takava tinodzikisa kuna Musa (kuti): “Rova nyanza netsvimbo yako.” Uye yakapatsanuka, uye mafasho (emvura) akasiyana-siyana akaita kunge mazikomo mahombe
Takave tinounza vamwe (vanhu vaFarawo) padyo nenzvimbo iyoyo
Uye takanunura Musa neavo vaiva naye
Uye takave tinonyudza vamwe (Farawo nevanhu vake)
Zvirokwazvo, umu (munyaya yaFarawo naMusa) mune chiratidzo, asi vazhinji vavo havatendi
Uye chokwadi, Tenzi vako (Muhammad (SAW)), zvirokwazvo ndivo vakurusa, uye vane tsitsi zhinji
Uye vaverengere nyaya yaIbrahim (Abrahamu)
Apo paakati kuna baba vake uye vanhu vake: “Munonamatei?”
Vakati: “Tinonamata zvidhori, uye takazvipira kwazviri.”
Ibrahim (Abrahamu)) akati: “Zvinokunzwai here kana manamata kwazviri?”
“Kana (kuti) zvinokubatsirai here kana kukukuvadzai?”
Vakati: “Asi takawana madzibaba edu achiita zvakadai.”
Ibrahim (Abrahamu)) akati: “Munoona here izvo zvamunonamata.”
“Imi nemadzibaba enyu?”
“Zvirokwazvo vavengi vangu kusara kwaTenzi vepasi rose (vanhu, maJinn nezvese zviripo).”
“Vanova vakandisika, uye ndivo vanonditungamira.”
“Uye ndivo vanondipa kudya, uye vanondipa zvekunwa.”
“Uye kana ndichirwara, ndivo vanondiporesa.”
“Uye vachandiita kuti ndife, uye vachandiita kuti ndive mupenyu zvakare.”
“Uye avo vandovimba kuti vachandiregerera zvivi zvangu pazuva rekutongwa.”
“Tenzi vangu! Ndipeiwo ungwaru, uye ndiisei pavaranda avo vakanaka.”
“Uye ndiitei nditaurwe zvakanaka pamusoro pangu pamapoka evanhu achatevera.”
“Uye ndiitei umwe wevagari venhaka yeParadhiso yemufaro.”
“Uye regererai baba vangu, zvirokwazvo, vanova vakarasika.”
“Uye musava munondinyadzisa pazuva iro (zvipuka zvose) zvichamutswa.”
“Zuva iro rokuti upfumi kana vana havabatsiri (hazvishandi kuti wakapfuma here kana kuti une vana vakawanda).”
“Kusara kweuyo achauya kuna Allah nemoyo wakachena (kubva mukusatenda nehunyengedzi).”
Uye paradhiso ichaiswa pedyo peavo vanotya (Allah) vachiita mabasa akanaka (Tarisai Qur’aan)
Uye Gehena richaburitswa pachena pamberi pevanhu vaiita mabasa akashata
Uye zvichanzi kwavari: “Varipiko avo (vanamwari venhema vamaifananidza naAllah) vamainamata.”
“Kunze kwaAllah? Vanokwanisa here kukubatsirai kana kuzvibatsira pachavo?”
Vachakandwa mumoto vachitanga nezviso zvavo, ivo nemaGhaawoon (vanaSatani, uye vanhu vakarasika)
Vachange vari vose nemauto aIblees (Satani)
Vachati vavemo vachipokana
“Tinopika naAllah, chokwadi taive takarasika zviri pachena.”
“Apo pataikufananidzai (pakunamata) naTenzi vepasi rose.”
“Uye hapana munhu akatirasisa kunze kwemaMujrimoon (vanaSatani uye vanhu vaitadza).”
“Iye zvino hatina vamiriri.”
“Kana shamwari yepedyo.”
“Kana tikawana mukana wekudzokera (Panyika), tichava zvirokwazvo pakati peavo vanotenda!”
Zvirokwazvo, mune zvose izvi mune chiratidzo, asi vazhinji vavo havatendi
Uye zvirokwazvo, Tenzi vako ndivo vane simba rakawanda, vane tsitsi zhinji
Vanhu vaNowa vakaramba vatumwa (Kuramba mutumwa mumwechete kuramba vese)
Apo mukoma wavo Nowa paakati kwavari: “Hamutye Allah nekuvateerera?”
“Ndiri mutumwa wechokwadi anovimbika kwamuri.”
“Saka ityai Allah, mova munochengetedza mirairo, uye mova munoteerera ini.”
“Handina mubairo wandinoda kubva kwamuri weizvi (Islaam); mubairo wangu haubvi kuna ani kunze kwaTenzi vepasi rose.”
“Saka chengetedzai mirairo yaAllah, movatya, uye mova munonditeerera.”
Vakati: “Tingatenda mauri ivo varombo (vanhu vari pasi pasi) vachikutevera?”
Akati: “Uye ndorwupi ruzivo rwandinarwo rezvavaiita?”
“Kutongwa kwavo kuna Tenzi vangu, kana muchiziva.”
“Uye handingadzingi vatendi.”
“Ini ndiri muyambiri chete ari pachena.”
Vakati (kuna Nowa): “Iwe Nowa! Ukaramba uchiita izvozvo, zvirokwazvo, uchava veavo vachatemwa nemabwe (kusvikira rufu).”
(Nowa) akati: “Tenzi vangu! Zvirokwazvo, vanhu vangu vave vanondiramba.”
“Nekudaro ivai mutongi pakati pangu navo, uye ivai munondinunura uye nevatendi vaneni.”
Uye takave tinomununura nevose vaakanga ainavo mungarava yakatakura
Takabva tanyudza vose vakanga vasara (vasina kupinda mungarava)
Zvirokwazvo! Umu mune chiratidzo, asi vazhinji vavo havatendi
Uye zvirokwazvo, Tenzi vako ndivo chokwadi vakurusa, uye vane tsitsi zhinji
MaAad (vanhu vaHud) vakaramba vatumwa (Kuramba mutumwa mumwechete kuramba vese)
Apo mukoma wavo Hud akataura kwavari kuti: “Hamutyewo Allah here?”
“Zvirokwazvo ndini mutumwa akavimbika kwamuri.”
“Saka ityai Allah uye moteerera ini.”
“Handina mubairo wandinobvunza kubva kwamuri weizvi. Mubairo wangu haubvi kuna ani kunze kwaTenzi vepasi rose.”
“Munovaka dzimba panzvimbo yese yakakwirira asi musingadzigari?”
“Uyezve mungatore (mungavake) dzimba (dzikuru dzakanaka) sezvinonzi muchagaramo zvachose?”
“Uye kana muchibata (mumwe munhu), munobata zveutsinye?”
“Saka ityai Allah, uye mova munonditeerera.”
“Uye ityai avo vakakupai zvose izvo zvamunoziva.”
“Vakakupai zvipfuwo nevana.”
“Uye mapindu nezvitubu.”
“Zvirokwazvo, ndinokutyirai marwadzo ezuva guru (zuva rekutongwa).”
Vakati: “Zvakafanana kwatiri kutiudza kana kusatiudza.”
“Idzi ndidzo nyaya dzevanhu vekutanga (vekare).”
“Uye isu hatisi kuzombotongwa (kuzomborangwa).”
Saka vakamuramba, uye tikavaparadza. Zvirokwazvo, mune izvi mune chidzidzo, asi vazhinji vavo havatendi
Uye zvirokwazvo, Tenzi vako ndivo chokwadi vakuru, uye vane tsitsi zhinji
Uye maThamood vakaramba vatumwa (Kuramba mutumwa mumwechete kuramba vese)
Rangarirai mukoma wavo Swaalih paakati kwavari: “Hamutyi Allah here?”
“Ndini mutumwa anovimbika kwamuri.”
“Saka ityai Allah, uye monditeerera.”
“Uye handidi mubairo kwamuri weizvi; mubairo wangu hausi kuna ani kunze kwaTenzi venyika yose.”
“Muchasiiwa here makasununguka (makachengetedzeka) nezvamuinazvo pano?”
“Mumapindu nezvitubu.”
“Uye zvirimwa zvakasvika uye madheti akapfava.”
“Uye munoveza mumakomo dzimba nehunyanzvi hukuru.”
“Saka ityai Allah, chengetedzai basa renyu kwavari, uye monditeerera.”
“Uye musava munoteerera mirairo yemaMusrifoon (vatadzi, mhondi, vatungamiriri vezvose zvakaipa).”
“Avo vanoita huori munyika, uye havaiiti zvakanaka.”
Vakati: “Iwe uri weavo vakaroiwa!”
“Iwe uri munhu akafanana nesu. Tipe chiratidzo kana uri munhu anotaura chokwadi.”
Akabva ati: “Heyo ngamera hadzi iyo. Ine kodzero yekunwa mvura, uye imi mune kodzero yekunwa mvura pazuva rinozivikanwa (zvijana zvekunwa mvura).”
“Uye musava munoibata (ngamera hadzi) zvakaipa muchiikuvadza, nekuti marwadzo ezuva guru achava anokubatai (anokuwirai).”
Asi vakaiuraya, asi vakazova vadembi
Saka vakava vanosangana nemarwadzo. Zvirokwazvo, uyu ndiwo muenzaniso, asi vazhinji vavo havatendi
Uye zvirokwazvo, Tenzi vako, ndivo chokwadi vane masimba ose, netsitsi dzose
Vanhu vaLoti vakaramba vatumwa (Kuramba mutumwa mumwechete kuramba vese)
Apo mukoma wavo Loti akati: “Hamutyi Allah nekuvateerera here?”
“Zvirokwazvo, ndiri mutumwa akavimbika kwamuri.”
“Saka ityai Allah, chengetedzai mirairo yavo, uye nditeererei.”
“Handina mubairo wandinobvunza kwamuri weizvi, asi mubairo wangu hausi kuna ani kunze kwaTenzi vepasi rose.”
“Munoenda kuvarume vose.”
“Uye muchisiya avo vamakasikirwa naAllah sevakadzi venyu? Zvirokwazvo, muri vanhu vanopfurikidza mirairo!”
Vakabva vati (kuna Loti): “Iwe Loti! Chokwadi, ukaramba uchidaro, zvirokwazvo, uchava umwe wevanhu vatichadzinga (mudunhu redu)!”
Akabva ati: “Ndiri mumwe wevanhu avo vanopokana nemi nekugumbuka zvakanyanya nezvamunoita zvakashata (Chingochani).”
“Tenzi vangu! Ndichengetedzei ini nemhuri yangu kubva kune zvavanoita.”
Saka takamununura nemhuri yake yese
Kusara kwechembere (mukadzi wake) akava weavo vakasara (muguta)
Mushure mezvo takaparadza vamwe vose
Uye takava tinovatumira marwadzo ainaya. Uye kunaya kwacho kwaiva kwakashata kune avo vakayambirwa
Zvirokwazvo, umu mune chiratidzo, asi vazhinji vavo havatendi
Uye zvirokwazvo, Tenzi vako, vane chokwadi masimba ose, uye vane tsitsi dzose
Vagari veAl-Aikah (Nzvimbo iri pedyo neMadyan) vakaramba vatumwa (Kuramba mutumwa mumwechete kuramba vese)
Apo Shuaib akati kwavari: “Hamutyi Allah here?”
“Ndiri mutumwa akavimbika kwamuri.”
“Saka ityai Allah, chengetedzai basa renyu kwavari, uye nditeererei.”
“Handina mubairo wandinobvunza kwamuri weizvi, asi mubairo wangu hausi kuna ani kunze kwaTenzi vepasi rose.”
“Ipai (vanhu) zvierwa zvakazara, uye musava munoderedza.”
“Uye ivai munopima zviri pachokwadi uye zvakaenzana.”
“Uye musava munobira vanhu nekudzikisa zvinhu zvavo, kana kuita zvakashata, kuita huori nehuumambara munyika.”
“Uye ivai munotya avo vakakusikai (Allah) nemadzitateguru.”
Vakabva vati: “Uri mumwe weavo vakaroiwa!”
“Uye uri munhu akafanana nesu, uye zvirokwazvo, tinofunga kuti uri mumwe wevanyepi!”
“Saka ita kuti zvidimbu zvidimbu zvedenga zvitidonhere, kana uri mumwe weavo vanotaura chokwadi!”
Akabva ati: “Tenzi vangu ndivo muzivi mukuru wezvamunoita.”
Asi vakaramba kutenda maari, saka marwadzo ezuva remvuri (gore rakasviba) akavabata. Zvirokwazvo, aiva marwadzo ezuva guru
Zvirokwazvo, mune zvose izvi mune chiratidzo, asi vazhinji vavo havatendi
Uye zvirokwazvo Tenzi vako, ndivo chokwadi vane masimba ose, netsitsi dzose
Uye zvirokwazvo, aya mashoko (Qur’aan) akadzikiswa naTenzi vepasi rose
Ayo akauya nemweya (Rooh) unovimbika (Jibreel – Gabriel (AS)
Mumoyo mako (Muhammad (SAW)) kuti ugova muyambiri
Mururimi rwechiArabhu rwuri pachena
Uye zvirokwazvo, rakataurwa (Qur’aan) muMagwaro (Torah neVhangeri) evanhu vekutanga
Hachisi chiratidzo kwavari here kuti vakadzidza vevana vaIzirairi (saAbdullah Ibn Salaam) vanoriziva (kuti ichokwadi)
Uye dai takaridzikisa (Qur’aan) kune asiri wechiArabhu
Uye ori verenga kwavari, vaisatenda mariri
Saka takaita kuti zvipinde (zvigare) mumoyo yevatadzi (kuramba Qur’aan)
Havatendi mariri kusvikira vaona marwadzo
Achauya kwavari nekuchimbidza, vasingatarisiri
Apo vachataura kuti: “Hatingambomisirwi here (kuparadzwa)?”
Vanoda here kuti marwadzo edu akurumbidze
Funga! Nyangwe tikaita kuti vafare kwemakore
Uye mushure mezvo kouya kwavari izvo zvavakavimbiswa
Zvose izvo zvaivafadza hazvizovadziviriri
Uye hatina kuparadza dunhu kusara kwekuti range rine vayambiri
Sekurangaridza, uye hatina kumbova vadzvanyiriri
Uye haasi maShayaatween (vanasatani) akaridzikisa (Qur’aan) pasi
Uye hazvienderani navo uye havazvikwanisi
Zvirokwazvo, vakaendeswa kure kuti vasarinzwe
Saka musava munodaidza vanamwari vamwe naAllah, nokuti mungava veavo vanowana marwadzo
Uye yambira rudzi rwako (Muhammad (SAW)) kubva kuhama dzepadyo
Uye iva netsitsi uye kuzvininipisa kune vatendi vanokutevera
Uye kana vakasakuteerera, taura kuti: “Ndakachena kubva kune izvo zvamunoita.”
Uye isa chivimbo kuna samasimba, vane tsitsi dzose
Avo vanokuona (Muhammad (SAW)) paunosimuka (kuti unamate usiku Tahajjud)
Uye zvaunoita uri pakati peavo vanopfugama (kunaAllah muminamato mishanu yepazuva)
Zvirokwazvo, ivo ndivo vanonzwa zvikuru, vanoziva zvese
Ndingakuudzei here (imi vanhu) maererano neavo maShayaatween (anasatani) anoenda kwavari
Vanoenda (maShayaatween) kune wese munyepi anotadza
Vanoteerera (maShayaatween, uye vanovapa zvavanenge	vanzwa	zvakavanzika	kubva kungirozi), uye vazhinji vavo vanyepi
Uye vadetembi, vanhu vakarasika vanovatevera
Hauoni here kuti vanotaura pamusoro penyaya dzese (vachirumbidza vanhu, vakanaka here kana kuti vakaipa) munhetembo dzavo
Uye vanotaura izvo zvavasingaiti

Kusara kweavo vanotenda (muIslaam) nokuita mabasa akanaka, uye vanorangarira Allah zvakanyanya, uye nekuzvidzivirira mushure mekunge vatadzirwa (vachipindura nenhetembo avo vadetembi vanotaura zvakaipa pamusoro peIslaam). Uye avo vanoita mabasa akashata vachaziva kuti vachapindurwa sei pavachapindurwa (magumo avo achange akaita sei)
Twaa – Seen. (Mavara aya ndemamwe ezvishamiso zveQur’aan, uye hapana anoziva zvaanoreva kunze kwaAllah). Idzi ndidzo ndima dzeQur’aan, uye Gwaro riri pachena
Rinotungamira (kunzira yakatwasuka) uye mashoko akanaka kune vatendi (muIslaam)
Avo vanoita Swalaah (Munamato), uye vanopa Zakaah (Zvipo kuvarombo), uye vane chokwadi maererano nehupenyu hwemangwana
Zvirokwazvo, avo vasingatendi muhupenyu hwemangwana, takava tinonatsa mabasa avo kuti vangodzungaira (kutenderera panyika) vasingaoni
Ndivo avo vachawana marwadzo akashata (Panyika). Uye muhupenyu hwemangwana vachava vanhu vakarasikirwa zvikuru
Uye iwe (Muhammad (SAW)) uri kudzidziswa Qur’aan kubva kune uyo ane hungwaru hwose, ane ruzivo zvikuru
Rangarira apo Musa akati kumhuri yake: “Zvirokwazvo, ndaona moto, ndichakuvigirai kubvako nyaya, kana ndichakuvigirai kubvako chitsiga chiri kubvira kuti muve munodziisa miviri yenyu.”
Asi paakasvika pauri, akashevedzwa: “Akomborerwa ndeuyo ari mumoto, uye uyo ari padyo nawo! Uye akarumbidzwa ndiAllah, Tenzi venyika yose (vanhu, maJinn nezvose zviripo).”
“Iwe Musa! Zvirokwazvo, ndini Allah, mukuru, ane ungwaru hwose.”
“Uye kanda tsvimbo yako!” Asi paakaiona ichifamba sekunge yaiva nyoka akatendeuka achitiza, uye haana kucheuka. (Zvikanzi): “Iwe Musa! Usatya, zvirokwazvo, vatumwa havatyi pamberi pangu.”
“Kusara kweuyo akatadza uye mushure mezvo akasandura zvakashata nezvakanaka, uye zvirokwazvo, ndinoregerera zvikuru, uye ndine tsitsi zhinji.”

“Uye isa ruoko rwako muhapwa dzako, richabuda richipenya pasina chinorikanganisa. (Zvimwe zvezviratidzo) kubva kuzviratidzo zvipfumbamwe kuna Farawo uye nevanhu vake. Zvirokwazvo, vari vanhu vanotadza.”
Asi zviratidzo zvedu pazvakauya kwavari zviri pachena kuti vaone, vakati: “Aya ndiwo mapipi ari pachena.”
Uye vakazviramba nekutadza uye nekuzvitutumadza, kunyangwe moyo yavo yaiva nechokwadi nazvo (kuti zvabva kuna Allah). Saka tarisa ndeapi aiva magumo eavo vaitadza

Zvirokwazvo, takapa ruzivo kuna Dawood (Davhidha) uye Sulaimaan (Soromoni), uye vese (vari vaviri) vakati: “Rumbidzo dzose uye kutendwa ndekwaAllah, avo vatisarudza pamusoro pevaranda vavo vose vanotenda!”

Uye Sulaimaan (Soromoni) akagara nhaka Dawood (Davhidha) (muruzivo). Akati: “Imi vanhu! Takava tinodzidziswa rurimi rweshiri, uye takava tinopiwa zvinhu zvose. Izvi, zvirokwazvo, inyasha dziri pachena (kubva kunaAllah).”
Uye pamberi paSulaimaan (Soromoni) mauto ake akaunganidzwa emaJinn, vanhu, uye shiri, uye vose vakagara vakarongeka zvekuhondo (vachienda mberi)
Kusvika vasvika munzvimbo yemasvosve, rimwe remasvosve rikati: “Imi masvosve! Pindai munzvimbo dzenyu, nekuti Sulaimaan (Soromoni) nemauto ake vangakutsikai, apo pavanenge vasingazivi.”

Iye Sulaimaan (Soromoni) akanyemwerera achifadzwa nemutauro waro uye akati: “Tenzi vangu! Ndipei simba uye mukana wekuti ndive ndinotenda makomborero enyu ayo amakandipa uye nevabereki vangu, uye kuti ndiite mabasa akanaka ayo anokufadzai, uye ndiisei netsitsi dzenyu pakati pevaranda venyu vakanaka.”
Akatarisa shiri, akati: “Chii chiri kuitika nekuti handisi kuona Hud-hud (Chigogodza)? Kana kuti ari pakati peavo vasipo?”
“Zvirokwazvo, ndichamutonga nemutongo wakaomarara, kana kuti ndichamuuraya, kunze kwekuti ondiunzira chinangwa chiri pachena.”
Asi Chigogodza hachina kugarisa, (chakadzoka) chikati: “Ndawana ruzivo urwo rwausati waruziva, uye ndauya kubva kuSaba’ (Sheba) nenyaya yechokwadi.”
“Ndawana mukadzi achivatonga, uye akapihwa zvinhu zvose zvinokwanisa kuitwa nemutongi (mambo) wose panyika, uye ane chigaro cheumambo chihombe.”
“Ndamuwana iye nevanhu vake vachinamata zuva pachinhambwe chaAllah, uye Satani avanatsira mabasa avo kwavari, uye avatendeutsa kubva kunzira yakatwasuka, saka havana kutungamirwa.”
“Havapfugamiri Allah avo vanoburitsa pachena izvo zvakavandika mumatenga uye nepanyika, uye vanoziva izvo zvamunovanza uye izvo zvamunoburitsa pachena.”
“Allah, Laa ilaaha illaa Huwa (Hakuna vamwe mwari vane kodzero yekunamatwa kunze kwavo), Tenzi vechigaro chikuru!”
Sulaimaan (Soromoni)) akati: “Tichaona kuti uri kutaura chokwadi here kana kuti uri weavo vanonyepa.”
“Enda netsamba yangu iyi, uye wovapa, uye wobva kwavari, uye woona kuti vanoti kudini.”
Mambokadzi weSaba’ (Sheba)) akati: “Imi makurukota! Zvirokwazvo, ndaunzirwa tsamba inoremekedzeka.”
“Zvirokwazvo, yabva kuna Sulaimaan (Soromoni), uye zvirokwazvo iri kuti: ‘Muzita raAllah, vane nyasha, vane tsitsi.’
‘Musava munozvitutumadza kwandiri, asi huyai kwandiri muchizvipira kuna Allah (semaMuslim).’”
Akati: “Imi makurukota! Ndipei pfungwa dzenyu panyaya yangu iyi. Handitongi nyaya kusvikira imi mavapo pandiri (mandipa pfungwa dzenyu).”
Vakati: “Tine simba rakawanda, uye tinogona hondo zvakanyanya, asi zviri kwamuri kupa mutongo. Saka fungai ndeupi mutongo wamuchapa.”
Akati: “Zvirokwazvo madzimambo, kana vapinda muguta (munyika) vanoiparadza, uye voita vanhu vanoremekedzwa pakati pavo vanhu vepasi pasi. Saizvozvo vanoita.”
“Asi zvirokwazvo, ndichavatumira chipo, uye ndoona kuti vatumwa vanodzoka nei.”
Saka vatumwa pavakasvika kuna Sulaimaan (Soromoni), akati: “Munondibatsira nehupfumi? Izvo Allah zvavakandipa zvikuru (zviri nani) kune izvo zvavakakupai! Asi imi munofadzwa nechipo chenyu!”

Sulaimaan (Soromoni) akati kumukuru wevatumwa vake): “Dzokera kwavari! Isu zvirokwazvo, tichauya kwavari nehondo (mauto) ayo avasingakwanisi kurwisa, uye tichavaburitsa kubva kwairi vachidzikisirwa, uye vachinyadziswa.”
Akati (Sulaimaan): “Imi makurukota! Ndiyani pakati penyu angauya nechigaro chake vasati vauya kwandiri vachizvipira nekuteerera?”
Ifreet (Jinn rakasimba) kubva kumaJinn rakati: “Ndinouya nacho kwamuri imi musati masumuka panzvimbo yenyu. Uye zvirokwazvo, ndine simba uye ndinovimbika pabasa rakadai.”

Umwe aiva neruzivo rweGwaro akati: “Ndinouya nacho kwamuri musati mabhwaira meso enyu!” Saka (Sulaimaan (Soromoni)) paakaona chava mberi kwake, akati: “Izvi kuda kwenyasha dzaTenzi vangu, kuti vaone kuti ndinotenda (zvakanaka) kana kuti handitendi! Uye uyo anotenda, zvirokwazvo, kutenda kwake kwakamunakira iye pachezvake; uye uyo asingatendi (kusatenda kwake kurasikirwa iye pachezvake). Zvirokwazvo, Tenzi vangu vakapfuma, uye vanopa zvizhinji.”
Akati: “Chisandurei (chigaro) zvimwe zvinhu kuti tione kuti achatungamirirwa (achachiziva) here, kana kuti achava weavo vasina kutungamirirwa.”

Saka paakauya (mambokadzi), zvakanzi (kwaari): “Chigaro chako chakadai here?” Akati: “Zvinenge zvakafanana.” Uye (Sulaimaan (Soromoni) akati): “Ruzivo rwakaunzwa kwatiri iye asati apihwa, uye taiva vanozvipira kuna Allah (semaMuslim).”
Uye icho chaainamata achisiya Allah chakamudzivirira (kutenda muIslaam), uye aiva weavo vasingatendi

Zvakanzi kwaari: “Pinda muAs-Sarh (imba yemagirazi ane mvura inoerera pasi pawo).” Asi paakaiona akafunga kuti chaiva chitubu, uye (akasimudza hembe) akavhura makumbo ake. (Sulaimaan (Soromoni) akati): “Zvirokwazvo, iSarh (Imba yemagirazi ane mvura inoerera pasi pawo).” Akati (Mambokadzi): “Tenzi vangu! Zvirokwazvo, ndazvitadzira, uye ndinozvipira muIslaam, pamwechete naSulaimaan (Soromoni) kuna Allah, Tenzi venyika yose (vanhu, maJinn nezvese zviripo).”
Uye zvirokwazvo kumaThamood takatumira mukoma wavo Swaalih achiti: “Namatai Allah (voga).” Uye tarisai! Vakava mapoka maviri achikakavadzana pakati pavo
Akati: “Imi vanhu vangu! Sei muchimhanyira kutsvaga zvakaipa zvakanaka musati mazvitsvaga? Sei musingatsvagi ruregerero rwaAllah, kuti muve munowana tsitsi?”
Vakati: “Tinoona kuti une munyama neavo vanewe.” Akati: “Zvakaipa zvenyu zvina Allah, asi muri vanhu varikuedzwa.”
Uye muguta maiva nevarume vapfumbamwe (kubva kuvana vemadzimambo avo) vaiita zvakashata munzvimbo, uye havana kumbozvishandura

Vakati: “Pikai naAllah umwe kune umwe kuti tichauraya muchivande usiku iye (Swaalih) uye nemhuri yake, uye mushure mezvo tichati kune hama dzake: ‘Hatina kumboona kufa kwake iye nemhuri yake, uye zvirokwazvo, tirikutaura chokwadi.’”
Saka vakaronga urongwa, uye isu takaronga urongwa, ivo vasingazivi
Uye ona kuti magumo eavo vakaronga aiva akaita sei! Zvirokwazvo, takavaparadza ivo nevanhu vavo pamwechete
Idzi ndidzo dzimba dzavo dzakaparadzwa zvachose nekuda kwekutadza kwavo. Zvirokwazvo, umu mune chidzidzo kuvanhu vanoziva
Uye takadzivirira avo vanotenda uye vaitya Allah, uye vachiita mabasa vachifadza ivo
Uye (rangarirai) Loti paakati kuvanhu vake: “Munoita here zvivi (chingochani) muchiona (zviri pachena)?”
“Munoita here chidaka chenyu (chevakadzi) kuvarume muchisiya vakadzi? Zvirokwazvo, muri vanhu vasingazivi vanotadza.”
Hapana imwe mhinduro yaakapihwa nevanhu vake kusara kwekuti vakati: “Buritsai Loti nemhuri yake kubva muguta renyu. Zvirokwazvo, ava vanhu vanoda zvekuchena!”
Saka takamununura iye nemhuri yake kusara kwemukadzi wake. Takamunyorera kuti ave weavo vakasara shure
Uye takaita kuti mvura (yematombo) inaye pavari. Iyo yaiva yakashata kune avo vange vayambirwa

Taura kuti (Muhammad (SAW)): “Kurumbidzwa kwose uye kutendwa ndekwaAllah, uye runyararo ngaruve kune varanda avo vavakasarudza (kuti vatambire mashoko avo)! NdiAllah here vari nani kana kuti izvo zvavanovasanganisa nazvo?”

Havasi here ivo vakasika matenga nepasi, uye vanotumira mvura kubva kudenga, tinoita nayo kuti mapindu akure murunako nemuyevedzo? Hazvizvi mukugona kwenyu kukudza miti yavo. Kune here umwe mwari naAllah? Kwete, asi vari vanhu vanobatanidza zvimwe zvinamatwa (navo)

Havasi here ivo vakagadzira pasi sechinhu chakagadzikwa, uye vakave vanoisa nzizi pakati paro, uye vakadzika makomo mariri, uye vakaisa muganhu pakati pemakungwa maviri (rine mvura inovava uye rimwe rine mvura inotapira)? Kune here mumwe mwari naAllah? Kwete, asi vazhinji vavo havazivi
Havasi here ivo vanodavira uyo anenge akasurukirwa, apo anovadana, uye ndivo vanobvisa zvakaipa, uye vanokuitai vagari venhaka yepasi? Kune here mumwe mwari naAllah? Zvishoma ndizvo zvamunorangarira

Havasi here ivo vanokutungamirai murima repasi nemugungwa, uye vanotumira mhepo senhau yakanaka pamberi petsitsi dzavo (mvura)? Kune here mumwe mwari naAllah? Allah varipamusoro peizvo zvavanovabatanidza nazvo
Havasi here ivo vanosika zvisikwa, uye vachave vanozvidzokorora, uye vanokupai raramo kubva kudenga nepasi? Kune mumwe mwari here naAllah? Taura kuti: “Hunzai humboo hwenyu kana muri pachokwadi.”
Taura kuti: “Hapana mumatenga nepasi anoziva zvisingaoneki kunze kwaAllah, uye havazivi apo vachave vanomutswa.”
Kwete, havana ruzivo rwehupenyu hwemangwana, asi havagutsikane nawo. Kwete, vari mapofu (murima) pamusoro pawo
Uye avo vasingatendi vanoti: “Kana tave huruva isu nemadzibaba edu, zvirokwazvo tichaunzwa (zvakare) here?”
“Zvirokwazvo takavimbiswa izvi isu nemadzitateguru edu mushure (medu), zvirokwazvo, hapana zviripo kunze kwengano dzekare.”
Taura (Muhammad (SAW)) kwavari: “Fambai munyika uye muone akave magumo evairamba (vatadzi).”
Usava unoshungurudzika pamusoro pavo, kana kutsutsumwa nemhaka yezvavanoronga
Uye avo (vasingatendi) vanoti: “Ndirinhi (apo) vimbiso iyi (ichazadziswa), kana muri pachokwadi?”
Taura: “Dzimwe dzenguva zvamunoshuvira kuti zvikasike zviri pedyo mumashure menyu.”
“Zvirokwazvo, Tenzi vako vakazara netsitsi kuvanhu, asi vakawanda vavo havatendi.”
Uye zvirokwazvo, Tenzi vako vanoziva zvakahwanda zviri muhana dzavo uye zvavanoburitsa
Uye hapana chakavanzika mumatenga uye nepasi, asi kuti zviri muGwaro rakajeka (Al-Lauh Al- Mahfoodh)
Zvirokwazvo, Qur’an iri rinotaura kuvana veIzrairi izvo zvakawanda zvavanosiyana
Uye zvirokwazvo, inhungamiri (Qur’aan iri) uye netsitsi kuvatendi
Zvirokwazvo, Tenzi vako vachatonga pakati pavo nemutongo wavo. Uye ndivo mukuru, muzivi wezvose
Saka isa vimbo yako kuna Allah; zvirokwazvo, uri (Muhammad (SAW)) pachokwadi chiri pachena
Zvirokwazvo, haungaite kuti vafi vanzwe kana kuti vanamatsi vanzwe kushevedza, apo pavanotiza, vachipira misana yavo
Kana kutungamira mapofu kubva mukurasika. Unongokwanisa kuti vanzwe avo vanotenda muzvidzidziso zvedu, uye neavo vakazvipira (maMuslim)
Uye kana shoko (redambudzo) razadziswa kwavari, tichaunza kubva pasi mhuka kwavari, ichitaura navo nemhosva yokuti vanhu havatendi muhuchokwadi hwendima dzedu
Uye zuva ratichaunganidza kubva murudzi rwega rwega chikwata chairamba ndima dzedu, uye vachave vanoendeswa (vanotinhirwa) (kunzvimbo yemutongo)

Kusvikira, apo vachasvika (pamberi paTenzi vavo panzvimbo yemutongo), vachati (Allah): “Mairamba here ndima dzangu apo maisadzinzwisisa neruzivo (rwechokwadi chadzo kana manyepo), kana chiii (chimwe) chamaiita?”
Uye shoko (redambudzo) richazadziswa kwavari nemhaka yekuti vakaita zvakaipa, uye havazokwanisi kutaura (kuti vazvidzivirire)
Havaoni here kuti takaita husiku kuti vave vanozorora mauri, uye zuva sechioneso? Zvirokwazvo, mazviri mune zviratidzo kuvanhu vanotenda
Uye pazuva iro hwamanda icharidzwa, uye vose varimumatenga nepasi vachatya kunze kweuyo Allah vachasarudza. Uye vose vachauya kwavari vakazvininipisa
Uye uchaona makomo wofunga kuti akagwinya, asi achadarika semadarikiro emakore. Basa raAllah, avo vakatsetsenura zvose. Zvirokwazvo, vane ruzivo rwezvese zvamunoita
Uyo anounza chakanaka (Islaam), achawana chiri nani kupfuura hukoshi hwacho; uye vachange vakachengetedzeka kubva kukutya kwezuva iroro
Uye uyo anounza chakaipa (kusatenda nezvitadzo), vachakandwa nezviso zvavo mumoto. (Zvichanzi kwavari): “Muri kupuhwa chimwe chinhu here kunze kweizvo maiita?”
Ndakarairwa (ini Muhammad (SAW)) kuti ndinamate Tenzi veguta rino (Makkah), avo vakariyeresa uye ndivo muridzi wezvose. Uye ndakarairwa kuti ndive pakati pemaMuslim (vanozvipira kuna Allah)
Uye kuti ndiverenge Qur’aan. Saka uyo anenge agamuchira gwara, anogamuchira munezvakanaka pachake; uye uyo anorasika, iva unoti (kwaari): “Ndingori mumwe wevayambiri.”

Uye iva unoti (Muhammad (SAW)): “Kurumbidzwa kwose nekutendwa ndekwa Allah; vachakuratidzai micherechedzo yavo (panyika kana zvirango), uye muchaiziva. Uye Tenzi vako hapana chavasingazivi kubva kune zvamunoita.”
Twaa – Seen – Meem. (Aya ndemamwe emavara ezvishamiso zveQur’aan, uye hapana umwe anoziva zvaanoreva kunze kwaAllah)
Idzi ndidzo ndima dzemuGwaro rakajeka (rinojekesa chokwadi kubva kumanyepo)
Tinokuverengera dzimwe dzenhaurwa dzaMusa naFarawo muchokwadi, kune vanhu vanotenda (muQur’aan iri uye nemuhumwechete hwaAllah)

Zvirokwazvo, Farawo akazvitutumadza munyika uye akaita vanhu vemo zvikwata, achidzvinyirira rimwe bato (vana vaIzirairi) pakati pavo, achiuraya vanakomana vavo, uye achisiya vakadzi vavo vararame. Zvirokwazvo, aive umwe wevatadzi vakuru
Uye takada kuvapa makomborero avo vaidzvinyirirwa munyika, uye kuti tivaite vatongi uye vagari venhaka
Uye kuvagadza munyika, uye kuratidza Farawo naHaamaan nemauto avo kubva kwavari izvo zvavaitya

Takave tinoudza amai vaMusa tichiti: “Muyamwisei (Musa), asi kana muchimutyira, saka mukandei murwizi uye musatya, kana kusuruvara. Zvirokwazvo, tichamuunza zvakare kwamuri, uye tichamuita mumwe wevatumwa (vedu).”
Naizvozvo vanhu vemhuri yaFarawo vakamunhonga, kuti azove kwavari muvengi uye honzeri yekusuruvara. Zvirokwazvo, Farawo, Haamaan uye nemauto avo vaive vatadzi
Uye mukadzi waFarawo akati: “Nyaradzo yemeso angu newe. Musamuuraya, dzimwe dzenguva achave anove chibatsiro kwatiri, kana kumuita mwanakomana wedu.” Asi havana kufunga (magumo azvo)
Uye moyo wamai vaMusa wakave nekusurukirwa. Vaiva pedyo nekuburitsa nyaya (yokuti ndimwana wavo), dai tisina kusimbisa moyo wavo (nekutenda), kuti vave vanoramba vari vevamwe vanotenda
Uye vakati kuhanzvadzi yake (yaMusa): “Mutevere!” Saka akamutarisa kunzvimbo iri kure muchihwande, asi ivo vasingambofungire
Uye taive tatorambidza (vamwe) vakadzi vanoyamwisa kwaari, (kusvikira apo yakauya (hanzvadzi yake) ikati: “Ndingakuratidzei kuimba iyo achachengeterwa imi, uye kumutarisa munzira yakanaka?”
Saka takamudzorera kuna amai vake, kuti maziso avo ave nerugare (nemufaro), uye kuti vasatsutsumwe, uye kuti vazive (amai vake) kuti vimbiso yaAllah ndeyechokwadi. Asi vakawanda vavo havazive

Uye apo aiva agwinya, uye abve zera (ava murume akakwana), takave tinomupa Hukm (huporofita, uye nekutonga kuzere) uye ruzivo rwechitendero (Islaam). Uye saizvozvo tinova tinopa mubairo kune vaiti vezvakanaka

Uye akapinda muguta munguva iyo vanhu vemo vaisambozvifungira (vakarivara), akawana imomo varume vaviri vachirwa – umwe wedivi rake (wechitendero chake – kubva kuvana veIzrairi) uye umwe wevavengi vake. Murume wedivi rake akamukumbira rubatsiro kubva kune muvengi, saka Musa akamurova chibhakera ndokumuuraya. Akati: “Izvi kuiita kwaSatani, zvirokwazvo, muvengi ari murasi ari pachena.”
Akati: “Tenzi vangu! Zvirokwazvo, ndazvitadzira, saka ndiregererei.” Naizvozvo vakamuregerera. Zvirokwazvo, ndivo muregereri mukuru, ane nyasha zhinji
Akati: “Tenzi vangu! Neizvo makandikomborera nazvo, handife ndakave mubatsiri wehoromori!”

Saka akabva atanga kutya, achitarisa tarisa muguta (achimirira magumo emhosva yake), saka murume aive amukumbira rubetsero zuro, akamushevedza achikumbira rubatsiro (zvakare). Musa akati kwaari: “Zvirokwazvo, uri nhungamiri inorasa iri pachena!”

Apo akafunga kuti abate murume aive muvengi wavo vose, murume akati: “Iwe Musa! Une chivimbo chokuda kundiuraya semaurairo awakaita murume nezuro? Chinangwa chako hapana kunze kwekuita muipi panyika, kwete kuve mumwe weavo vanoita zvakanaka.”

Uye pakauya murume achimhanya, kubva kumapeto eguta. Akati: “Iwe Musa! Zvirokwazvo, madzimambo vagara dare vose maererano newe kuti vakuuraye, saka tiza. Zvirokwazvo, ndiri wevamwe vakanaka vanokuyambira.”
Saka akatiza ikoko, achicheuka-cheuka nekutya. Akati: “Tenzi vangu! Ndinunurei kubva kune vanhu vakaipa!”
Uye paainge achienda kudivi reMadyan (Midian), akati: “Dzimwe nguva Tenzi vangu vanove vanonditungamira kugwara rakanaka.”

Uye paakasvika pabvuva (tsime) reMadyan (Midian), akawana varume vaicherera zvipfuwo zvavo mvura, uye padivi pavo akaona vakadzi vaviri vakarindira zvipfuwo zvavo. Akati: “Chii chiri kukunetsai?” Vakati: “Hatisi kukwanisa kupa mvura zvipfuwo zvedu kusvikira vafudzi vabvisa zvavo. Uye baba vedu vakwegura.”
Saka akapa zvipfuwo zvavo mvura, ndokubva adzokera pamumvuri, uye akati: “Tenzi vangu! Chokwadi! Ini ndinoda chero zvacho chakanaka chamunondipa!”

Saka kwakauya kwaari mumwe wevakadzi achifamba achinyara akati: “Zvirokwazvo, baba vangu vari kukushevedza kuti vagokupa mubairo wako nokutipa kwawaita mvura (zvipfuwo zvedu). Saka paakaenda kwavari uye atsanangudza rungano, vakati: “Usatya. Wapunyuka kubva kuvanhu vakaipa.”
Mumwe wavo (wevakadzi vaviri) akati: “Imi baba! Munyorei basa! Zvirokwazvo, munhu wechirume akanaka kwamuri wekunyora basa ndeuyo akasimba anovimbika.”

Vakati: “Ndinoda kukuroodza mumwe wevanasikana vangu ava, mushure mekunge wandishandira kwemakore masere, asi ukazadzisa makore gumi, zvinenge zviri kwauri. Asi handidi kukuisa panguva yakaoma. Kana Allah vachida, uchandiwana ndiri mumwe weavo vakanaka.”
Iye (Musa) akati: “Ichi (chiwirirano) chiri pakati pangu nemi, nguva yandichapedza pakati pedziviri pasave nekundidzvinyirira. Uye Allah ndivo mumiriri pamusoro pezvatinotaura.”

Apo Musa paakazadzikisa nguva yacho, uye achifamba nemhuri yake, akaona moto kudivi reToor (Gomo). Akati kumhuri yake: “Mirai! Ndaona moto; zvingadaro kuti ndingakuvigirai nhau kubva ikoko, kana chitsiga chemoto kuti mugozvidziisa.”

Saka paakasvika pauri (moto) akashevedzwa kubva kurutivi rwerudyi rwemupata, munzvimbo yakaropafadzwa, kubva mumuti: “Iwe Musa! Zvirokwazvo, ndini Allah, Tenzi vezvinhu zvose (vanhu, maJinn nezvose zviripo)!”

“Uye kanda tsvimbo yako!” Apo akaiona ichifamba senyoka, akatendeuka achitiza nekutya, uye haana kutarisa mushure zvekare. (Zvikanzi): “Iwe Musa! Swedera pedyo, usatye. Zvirokwazvo, uri pane avo vakachengetedzwa.”

“Isa ruoko rwako muhapwa mako, richabuda kubvamo riri chena risina chirwere, uye endesa ruoko rwako kune rimwe divi kuti uve unosununguka kubva mukutya. Iyi ndiyo micherechedzo miviri kubva kuna Tenzi vako kuna Farawo uye nemadzimambo ake. Zvirokwazvo, ndivo vanhu vasingateereri.”
Akati: “Tenzi vangu! Ndakauraya mumwe wevarume vavo, ndinotya kuti vangandiuraye.”
“Uye mukoma wangu Haaroon (Aroni) ndiye anonyatsogona kutaura kudarika ini. Saka nditumeyi naiye kuti ave mubatsiri achinditsigira. Zvirokwazvo, ndinotya kuti vangandirambe.”
Allah vakati: “Tichave tinokusimbisa kuburikidza nemukoma wako, uye tichakupai simba mose, kuti vasave vanokukuvadzai; nemicherechedzo yedu, mose muri maviri neavo vachakuteverai muchave vakundi.”
Saka apo Musa akauya kwavari nemicherechedzo yedu iri pachena, vakati: “Hapana nezviripo kunze kwekuti masaramusi. Hatina kubvira tanzwa nezvazvo kubva kumadzitateguru edu.”
Musa akati: “Tenzi vangu vanoziva uyo anouya negwara kubva kwavari, uye neuyo achave nekufara munguva yekupedzisira muhupenyu hwemangwana. Zvirokwazvo, vasingatendi (muIslaam) havabudirire.”

Uye Farawo akati: “Imi madzimambo! Handizivi kuti mune mumwe mwari kunze kwangu. Saka ndivesere moto, iwe Haamaan, mokanya zvidhina nekuzvipisa, uye mondivakira manera kuti ndive ndinoona Mwari waMusa; uye zvirokwazvo, ndinofunga kuti Musa ndeuyo wevanyepi.”
Uye iye nemauto ake vaizvitutumadza munyika zvisina mvumo, uye vaifunga kuti havaizofa vakadzoka kwatiri
Saka takamubata (takamutora) iye nemauto ake, uye tikavakanda mugungwa (uye tikavanyudza). Saka hona magumo (iwe Muhammad (SAW)) evatadzi
Uye takavaita vatungamiri vaidaidzira kumoto, uye pazuva rekumutswa havazobatsirwi
Uye takaita kuti kurengerwa (kutukwa) kuve kunovatevera pano pasi, uye nezuva rekumutswa, vachange vari pane avo vanhu vasingagamuchiri tsitsi dzaAllah
Zvirokwazvo, takapa Musa mushure mokunge taparadza mapoka ekare Gwaro (Torah) sechiedza kuvanhu, uye nenhungamiro uye nyasha, kuti vave vanorangarira
Uye iwe (Muhammad (SAW)) wainge usiri kudivi remabvazuva, apo takaburitsa pachena kuna Musa mirairo, uye wainge usiri pane vapupuri

Asi takave tinosika mapoka (vanhu vakawanda mushure maMusa(AS)), uye kureba kwenguva kwakavadarika pavari. Uye iwe (Muhammad (SAW)) wakanga usiri mugari pakati pevanhu veMadyan (Midian) uchivaverengera ndima dzedu. Asi ndisu tairamba tichitumira (vatumwa)

Uye wainge (Muhammad (SAW)) usiri kudivi reToor (Gomo) apo takadaidzira (Zvinonzi Allah vakashevedza vatevedzeri vaMuhammad (SAW) uye vakadavira, kana kuti Allah vakashevedza Musa (AS)). Asi (wakatumwa) senyasha kubva kuna Tenzi vako, kunopa yambiro kune vanhu uko kusina kumbosvika muyambiri mushure mako, kuti vave vanorangarira

Uye dai (tainge) tisina (kukutuma kuvanhu vekuMakkah), dai dambudziko rakavawira iro rakatungamidzwa nemaoko avo, vaizova vanoti: “Tenzi vedu! Sei musina kutitumirawo mutumwa? Taizova tinotevera ndima dzenyu uye taizova pakati pevatendi.”

Asi apo chokwadi chakauya kubva kwatiri, vakati: “Sei asina kupihwa zvakafanana nezvakapihwa Musa?” Havana kusatenda mune izvo zvakapuhwa Musa zvekare? Uye vanoti: “Mhando mbiri dzemasaramusi (Torah neQur’aan) dzinobatsirana!” Uye vanoti: “Zvirokwazvo, muzvose hatitendi.”
Taura (Muhammad (SAW)) kuti: “Hunzai gwaro kubva kuna Allah iro riri nani mugwara kudarika aya maviri (Torah neQur’aan), kuti ndiritevere, kana muri vechokwadi.”

Asi vakasakudavira, ziva kuti vari kutevera zvido zvavo. Uye ndiani akarasika zvakanyanya kudarika uyo anotevera zvido zvake asina gwara kubva kuna Allah? Zvirokwazvo, Allah havatungamiriri vanhu vakaipa
Uye muzvirokwazvo takave tinosvitsa shoko (Qur’aan) kwavari, kuti vave vanorangarira
Avo vatakapa gwaro mushure mavo (Torah neVhangeri), vanotenda (vakadzidza pakati pavo) mariri (Qur’aan)

Uye kana rikaverengwa kwavari vanoti: “Tinotenda mariri. Zvirokwazvo, ichokwadi kubva kuna Tenzi vedu. Zvirokwazvo, mushure maro taive maMuslim (vanozvipira kuna Allah saAbdullah Ibn Salaam naSalmaan Al-Faarisi).”
Ava vachave vanopuhwa mubairo wavo kaviri nekuti vaive vanotsungirira, nekupfuudza zvivi nezvakanaka, uye kupa zvipo kubva kune izvo zvatakavapa
Uye vakanzwa zvakaipa vanozvisudurudza kubva pazviri uye vanoti: “Kwatiri mabasa edu, uye kwamuri mabasa enyu. Rugare ngaruve kwamuri. Hatidi nzira yevasingazivi.”
Zvirokwazvo, hautungamiri (Muhammad (SAW)) uyo waunoda, asi Allah ndivo vanotungamira uyo wavanoda. Uye vanoziva zvakanaka avo vakatungamirirwa

Uye vanoti: “Kana tikave tinotevera gwara newe, tichava tinobviswa kubva munyika yedu.” Hatina here kuvadzikunurira (kuvagadzika) nzvimbo inoera (Makkah), umo munounzwa michero yendudzi dzose, sekudya kunobva kwatiri, asi vakawanda vavo havazivi

Uye maguta mangani atakaparadza, ayo aiva asingatendi raramo yavo (vasingateereri Allah uye vachitadza)! Uye idzo inzvimbo dzavo dzisina kumbogarwa mushure mavo kunze kwenguva shoma. Uye zvirokwazvo, takave vagari venhaka
Uye Tenzi vako havamboparadzi maguta kusvikira vatumira muguta ravo hombe mutumwa achivaverengera ndima dzedu. Uye hatiparadzi maguta kunze kwekuti vagari vavo vari vatadzi
Uye chero chii chamakapuhwa rufaro rwehupenyu hwepano pasi uye chishongedzo chawo, uye izvo zvina Allah (hupenyu hwemangwana) zviri nani uye hazviperi. Asi hamufungewo here

Asi uyu watakavimbisa vimbiso tsvene (Paradhiso), iyo yaachawana iri yechokwadi, akafanana here neuyo watakaita kuti ave anofarira hupenyu hwepano pasi, uye nemusi wekumutswa achava pakati peavo vanounzwa (kunorangwa muGehena)
Uye (rangarirai) zuva apo vachave (Allah) vanovadaidza vachiti: “Varipi avo (vamaiti) vabetseri vangu vamaitungamidza?”

Kune avo shoko richaita chokwadi kwavari (kuti varangwe) vachati: “Tenzi vedu! Ava ndivo vatakarasisa. Takavarasisa, semarasikiro ataivewo takaita. Tinoramba mhosva (kubva kwavari) pamberi penyu. Handisu vavainamata.”
Uye zvichanzi (kwavari): “Daidzai avo vabatsiri venyu”, uye vachavadaidza, asi havavape mhinduro, uye vachaona marwadzo. (Vachave vanoshuvira kuti) dai vaive vakatungamirwa
Uye (rangarirai) zuva iro (Allah) ravachadaidza vachiti: “Ndeipi mhinduro yamakapa vatumwa?”
Saka nhau (dzemhinduro yakanaka) dzichavanzika kwavari pazuva iroro, uye havazokwanisa kubvunzana
Asi kune uyo akareurura, akatenda (muIslaam), uye akaita mabasa akanaka, achave pakati pevanhu vakabudirira

Uye Tenzi vako vanosika icho chinhu chavanoda nekusarudza, uye (vanhu) havana sarudzo yavanayo (pachinhu chipi zvacho). Allah ndivo muyemurwi, uye ndivo vari pamusoro pane izvo zvavanosanganisa (sevabatsiri vavo)
Uye Allah vanoziva izvo zvavanoviga mumoyo yavo, uye zvavanoburitsa

Uye ndiAllah: Laa ilaaha illaa Huwa (Hakuna chimwe chinhu chine kodzero yekunamatwa kunze kwavo). Kwavari ndiko kune rumbidzo dzese nekutendwa kwose mukutanga (pasi pano) uye mukupedzisira (muhupenyu hwemangwana). Uye ndivo vanotonga, uye kwavari ndiko kwamuchadzorerwa
Taura (Muhammad (SAW)): “Ndiudzei! Dai Allah vakave vanoita kuti kurambe kuri husiku kusvika zuva rekumutswa, ndeupi mwari kusiya kwaAllah angakuunzirai chiedza? Asi hamunzwi here?”

Taura (Muhammad (SAW)): “Ndiudzei! Dai Allah vakave vanoita kuti kurambe kune chaedza kusvika zuva rekumutswa, ndeupi mwari kusiya kwaAllah angakuunzirei husiku kuti muve munozorora? Asi hamuoni here?”
Kubudirikidza netsitsi dzavo vakave vanokugadzirirai husiku nechaedza kuti muve munozorora mauri (husiku), uye kuti mutsvage makomborero avo (muchaedza), uyezve kuti muve vanhu vanotenda
Uye zuva iro ravachashevedza (vasingatendi), uye vachati: “Varipi (avo vamaiti) vabatsiri vangu, avo vamaitaura?”

Uye tichave tinotora kubva murwudzi rwega-rwega mupupuri, uye tichati: “Hunzai humboo hwenyu.” Saka vachave vanoziva kuti chokwadi china Allah (voga), uye manyepo avo avaiunza achava anonyangarika kubva kwavari

Zvirokwazvo, Qaaroon (Korah) aiva mumwe wevanhu vaMusa, asi aiva achizvitutumadza kwavari. Uye takamupa hupfumi, svumbunuro dzacho dzaitoremera varume vakagwinya. Rangarira apo vanhu vake vakati kwaari: “Usafare (nehupfumi usingatendi Allah). Zvirokwazvo, Allah havadi avo vanofara (nehupfumi vasingatendi Allah).”

“Asi tsvaga neizvo Allah vakakukomborera nazvo, imba yemangwana, uye usakanganwe chidimbu chako chezvakatenderwa muhufaro hwepano pasi; uye ita zvakanaka sezvakaita Allah kwauri, uye usava unokonzeresa zvakaipa munyika. Zvirokwazvo, Allah havadi honzeri.”

Akataura kuti: “Izvi zvakave zvinopihwa kwandiri nekuda kweruzivo rwandinarwo.” Akanga asingazive here kuti Allah vakaparadza madzinza mushure make, varume vakanga vakasimba kupfuura iye vaine upfumi hwakawanda hwavakaunganidza? Asi vaiti vemabasa akaipa havasi kuzobvunzwa maererano nezviito zvavo (nekuti Allah vanoziva nokudaro vachapihwa marwadzo vasina kana nekumbotongwa)
Nokudaro akabva aenda kuvanhu vake akazvishongedza, avo vainyanyoda hupenyu hwepasi pano, vakati: “Aaa, tingadai taive neizvo zvakapihwa kuna Qaaroon! Zvirokwazvo, ndiye muridzi weupfumi huzhinji.”

Asi avo vakapihwa ruzivo (rwechitendero) vakati: “Matambudziko kwamuri! Makomborero aAllah (muupenyu hwemangwana) akanakira vatendi, uye nevanoita mabasa akanaka, uye hapana achakwanisa kuwana izvi kusara kweavo vanotsungirira.”
Nekudaro takamuita kuti ave anomedzwa nepasi uye nenzvimbo yake yokugara. Uye ange asina chikwata kana bato rinomubatsira kunze kwaAllah, uye aisave mumwe weavo vaikwanisa kuzvibatsira

Uye avo vainyanyoda (chinzvimbo) sechake mumashure vakatanga kuti: “Chizivai kuti Allah vanopa hupfumi huzhinji kana kuderedza kune uyo wavanoda pavaranda vavo. Ingadai dzakanga dzisiri nyasha dzaAllah kwatiri, vangadai vakaita kuti tive tinomedzwa nevhu! Uye avo vasingatendi havasi kuzobudirira.”

Uyo musha wamangwana (Paradhiso), tichaugadziriria avo vasingatyore mitemo vachiramba chokwadi nepamusana pekuzvikudza uye udzvanyiriri nekukonzeresa panyika. Uye mhedzisiro tsvene ndeye avo vanoita mabasa akanaka (Tarisai Qur’aan)
Uyo anounza zvitsvene, achawanawo zvitsvene; uye uyo anoita zvakashata, ivo vanoita mabasa akashata vachawaniswawo mukoho wezvavaiita

Zvirokwazvo, avo vakakupa (Muhammad (SAW)) Qur’aan, vachakudzosa kuMa’aad (nzvimbo yekudzokera, kuda kuMakkah kana kuParadhiso). Taura (Muhammad (SAW)): “Tenzi vangu vanoziva maererano neuyo anounza gwara rakajeka, uye neuyo akarasika zvikurusa.”
Uye wakanga usingambotarisira kuti Gwaro iri (Qur’aan) richadzikisirwa kwauri, asi itsitsi kubva kuna Tenzi vako. Naizvozvo usava mubatsiri wevasingatendi

Iwe Muhammad (SAW)) usavaite kuti vakusiyise kuparidza ndima dzaAllah Tenzi kuvanhu mushure mekunge dzadzikiswa kwauri; uye shevedzera vanhu kuti vatende muhumwechete hwaTenzi vako. Zvekare usave mumwe wemaMushrikoon (vanosanganisa zvimwe zvinhu naAllah pakunamata)

Uye usava unodavidza pamwe naAllah zvimwe zvinamatwa. Laa ilaaha illaa Huwa (Hapana kana ane kodzero yokunamatwa kusara kwavo (Allah)). Zvinhu zvose zvichaparara kusara kwechiso chavo. Uye ndivo vane hutongi hwese, uye kwavari ndiko kwamuchadzorerwa (mese)
Alif – Laam – Meem. (Mavara aya ndemamwe ezviratidzo zvaAllah, uye hapana kana ani anoziva zvaanoreva kusara kwavo)
Asi vanhu vanofunga kuti vachangosiiwa vakadaro nekuti vataura kuti “Tinotenda” uye vasina kumboedzwa

Uye zvirokwazvo takave tinoedza avo vaive mumashure mavo. Uye Allah vachaita kuti chokwadi cheavo vari muchokwadi chizivikanwe. Uye vachaita kuti manyepo evanyepi ave anozivikanzwa. (Kunyangwe Allah vachiziva zvese vasati vavaedza)
Kana kuti vanoita zvakaipa vanofunga kuti vachatinzvenga? Hapana kana nechisvinu pane izvo zvavanofunga
Uyo anotarisira kusangana naAllah, zvirokwazvo, nguva yaAllah inotosvika, uye ndivo vanonzwa zvese, vanoziva zvese
Uye uyo anoshanda nesimba (achirwisa), zvirokwazvo, anenge achizvishandira pachake. Zvirokwazvo, Allah havana kana nechavanoda kubva kuzvisikwa zvose (vanhu, maJinn nezvose zviripo)
Uye avo vanotenda (muIslaam) uye voita mabasa akanaka, zvirokwazvo, tichave tinoregerera zvitadzo zvavo, uye tovapa mubairo unoenderana nezvakanaka zvavaiita

Uye takave tinokomekedza munhu kuti ave anoita mabasa akanaka uye nekuteerera vabereki vake; asi kana vakakumanikidza kusanganisa ini nezvimwe pakunamata, pamusoro peizvo hauna ruzivo nazvo, aiwa usavatevedzere. Kwandiri muchadzoka, uye ndichave ndinokuudzai izvo zvamaiita
Uye avo vanotenda (muIslaam) uye vachiita mabasa akanaka, zvirokwazvo, tichaita kuti vave vanopinda (muParadhiso) pamwechete nevanoita mabasa akanaka

Muvanhu mune vamwe vanoti: “Tinotenda muna Allah.” Asi akawana dambudziko munzira yaAllah, anobva aona kunge muedzo wevanhu semarwadzo aAllah; uye kana kukunda kukauya kubva kuna Tenzi vako, (vanyengedzi) vanobva vati: “Zvirokwazvo, taive pamwechete (tichikubatsirai).” Asi Allah havazive here zviri mumoyo yevanhu nemaJinn
Zvirokwazvo, Allah vanoziva avo vanotenda, uye zvirokwazvo, vanoziva avo vanonyengedza
Avo vasingatendi vanoti kune avo vanotenda: “Teverai nzira yedu tichave tinotakura zvitadzo zvenyu.” Havasi kuzombotakura zvitadzo zvavo. Zvirokwazvo, ava vanyepi
Zvirokwazvo, vachatakura mabasa avo akaipa, uye vachatakura mamwe asiri avo, uye zvirokwazvo, pazuva rekutongwa vachave vanobvunzwa maererano nezvavaiwedzeredza

Zvirokwazvo, takatumira Nowa kuvanhu vake, uye akagara navo kwemakore mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu (950) (achivashevedza kuti vatende kuhumwechete hwaAllah). Nokudaro vakaparadzwa nemapopoma emvura apo vainge vasingatendi
Naizvozvo takamununura (Nowa) uye nevaiva naye mungarava, uye takaita kuti (ngarava) ive chiratidzo kuvanhu nemaJinn (zvisikwa zvakasikwa nemoto)
(Rangarirai) apo Abrahamu akaudza vanhu vake kuti: “Namatai Allah (Voga), uye movatya. Izvi ndizvo zvakakunakirai kana muchiziva.”

“Zvirokwazvo, murikunamata zvidhori kunze kwaAllah, uye murikuwedzeredza manyepo. Zvirokwazvo, izvo zvamunonamata kunze kwaAllah hazvina kana nemasimba ekukupai raramo yenyu. Naizvozvo tsvakayi raramo yenyu kubva kuna Allah chete, uye vanamatei vari voga, uye mova munovatenda. Kwavari ndiko kwamuchadzorerwa.”
“Uye kana mukaramba, zvirokwazvo, madzinza aive mumashure menyu akaramba (vatumwa vavo). Uye basa remuporofita ndere kusvitsa shoko zvakakwana zviripachena.”
Havaoni here matangiro akaita Allah chisikwa, nekuchidzokorora (kuchisika). Zvirokwazvo, kuna Allah zvinhu zvidukusa

Taura (Muhammad (SAW) kuti): “Fambai munyika moona sikiro yakaita Allah zvisikwa zvekare. Uye Allah vachaunza zvisikwa zvose zvehupenyu hwemangwana (vachazvimutsa mushure merufu). Zvirokwazvo, Allah vane masimba pamusoro pezvinhu zvose.”
Vanorwadzisa wavanoda, uye vanoratidza tsitsi wavanoda. Zvekare kwavari ndiko kwamuchadzorerwa
Uye hamukwanisi kutiza Allah pano pasi zvimwechetezvo nekudenga. Zvekare hamumbowani mubatsiri kana muchengeti kusara kwaAllah
Uye avo vanoramba kutenda mundima dzaAllah zvekare nekusangana navo, ndeavo vasisina tarisiro yekuwana tsitsi dzangu, uye ndivo vachazowana mutongo wakaomarara unorwadza

Nokudaro hapana mhinduro yakabva kuvanhu vaIbrahim (Abrahamu) kusara kwekuti: “Muurayei kana kumupisa.” Naizvozvo Allah vakamununura kubva kumoto. Zvirokwazvo, mazviri mune zviratidzo kuvanhu vanotenda

Uye Ibrahim (Abrahamu) akati: “Murikutora zviumbwa (mukunamata) kunze kwaAllah. Rudo rwenyu nderwe pano pasi chete. Asi pazuva rekumutswa muchavengana (mucharambana) mega mega, uye muchatsvinyirana pachenyu. Naizvozvo nzvimbo yenyu ichange iri kumoto, zvekare muchange musina kana vabatsiri.”
Nekudaro Loti akatenda maari (Ibrahim (Abrahamu)). Iye Ibrahim (Abrahamu) akati: “Ndichatama kuzviitira Tenzi vangu. Zvirokwazvo, ndivo vane masimba ese, uye nehuchenjeri hwese.”

Uye takave tinomupa (Ibrahim (Abrahamu)), Ishaaq (Isaka) naYa’qoob (Jakobho), uye takave tinokomekedza zvekare kuvana vake huporofita pamwe neMagwaro (Torah, Vhangeri neQur’aan), vose kubva kuvana vaIbrahim (Abrahamu), uye takave tinomupa mubairo wake pasi pano. Uye muzvirokwazvo, muupenyu hunotevera achange ari pamwe neavo vanoita mabasa akanaka
Uye (rangarirai) apo Loti akaudza vanhu vake achiti: “Zvirokwazvo, murikuita chingochani (chitadzo chikurusa) chisina kana naani zvake mushure menyu (pakati pevanhu nemaJinn) akambochiita pasi pano.”

“Zvirokwazvo, munoita chingochani pachenyu, uye kubvutira vanhu vari parwendo zvinhu zvavo! Uye munoita Al-Munkar (kusatenda nehunyengedzi nezvimwe zvitadzo) mumisangano yenyu.” Asi vanhu vake havana zvavakapindura kusara kwekuti: “Ita kuti mutongo waAllah unorwadza uuye kwatiri kana uri mumwe weavo vanotaura chokwadi.”
Akati: “Tenzi vangu! Ndipeiwo rubatsiro pamusoro pevanhu vanoita mabasa akaipa.”
Uye apo vatumwa vedu vakauya kuna Ibrahim (Abrahamu) nenhaurwa tsvene vakati: “Zvirokwazvo, tichaparadza vanhu (vaLoti) veguta iri (Sodom kuPalestine); chokwadi, vanhu varo vatadzi.”

Ibrahim (Abrahamu) akati: “Asika pakati pavo pana Loti.” (Ivo vatumwa) vakati: “Tinoziva ari mukati maro. Tichave, zvirokwazvo, tinomununura (Loti) uye nemhuri yake kusara kwemudzimai wake, uyo achave anosara mumashure (nevatadzi uye oparadzwa navo).”

Uye pakaenda vatumwa vedu kuna Loti, ainge ava kutya nekuda kwavo uye nekusagadzikana. Ivo vakabva vati: “Usatye kana kushushikana! Zvirokwazvo, tichanunura iwe nemhuri yako kusara kwemudzimai wako, uyo achasara neavo vachasara (uye achaparadzwa navo).”
“Zvirokwazvo, tatova pedyo nekuburutsa marwadzo makurusa kuvanhu vedhorobha iri kubva kudenga, nekuda kwekuti vaityora mitemo yaAllah.”
Uye naizvozvo takave tinosiya kubva kwariri chiratidzo (Gungwa reDead Sea kuPalestine) kuvanhu vanonzwisisa

Uye kuMadyan (Midian), takave tinovatumira mukoma wavo Shuaib. Akavaudza kuti: “Imi vanhu vangu! Namatai Allah chete uye motarisira makomborero emabasa akanaka pazuva rekumutswa. Uye musave vanhu vanokanganisa seavo vanokanganisa.”
Naizvozvo vakamuramba (Shuaib), nokudaro vakabva vavhiringidzwa nekundengendeka kwenyika. Vakabva vafa vakapfugama vari mudzimba dzavo

Uye maAad pamwechete nemaThamood! Uye chokwadi (kuparadzwa kwavo) kwakaburitswa pachena kwamuri kubva munzvimbo dzavo dzavaigara. Chamangwiza (Satani) akanatsurudza mabasa avo (kuburikidza nehunyengedzi hwake), uye akavabvisa munzira yakatwasuka, kunyangwe zvazvo vakanga vakapiwa huchenjeri
Uye takaparadza Qaaroon (Korah), Farawo, uye naHaamaan. Uye zvirokwazvo, Musa akauya kwavari nendima dziri pachena, asi vaizvitutumadza panyika, ivo vasingakwanisi kutiza (mutongo wedu wakaomarara)

Nekudaro takashungurudza umwe neumwe wavo maerano nezvitadzo zvake; pakati pavo pane avo vatakatumira mutongo (mhepo yeruzha nematombo ainaya sezvatakaita kuvanhu vaLoti), uye mavari mune vamwe vatakashungurudza neruzha rwakaomarara (sezvatakaita kumaThamood kana kuvanhu vaShuaib). Uye mavari mune vamwe vatakaita kuti vamedzwe nenyika (sezvakaitwa Qaaroon (Korah)), uye kubva mavari mune vamwe vatakanyudza mugungwa (sevanhu vaNowa kana vanhu vaFarawo). Naizvozvo vakanga vasiri Allah vaivakanganisira, ivo ndivo vaizvikanganisira pachavo
Muenzaniso weavo vanotora vabatsiri kunze kwaAllah wakafanana newe dandemutande iro rinozvivakira imba, asi zvirokwazvo, imba yedandemutande haina kana nekusimba kwose, dai vaiziva
Zvirokwazvo, Allah vanoziva izvo zvavanodavidza kunze kwavo. Ndivo vane simba rese, uye neungwaru hwose
Uye mienzaniso iyi tinoiburitsa pachena kuvanhu, asi hapana achainzwisisa kusara kweavo vane ruzivo (rwaAllah nemicherechedzo yavo)

Allah vakati kuna mutumwa Muhammad (SAW)): “Allah (voga) ndivo vakasika matenga nepasi rino muchokwadi (uye hapana kana ani akabatsirana navo pakuzvisika).” Zvirokwazvo, mazviri mune micherechedzo kuvanhu vanotenda

Verenga (Muhammad (SAW)) zvakadzikiswa muGwaro (Qur’aan), uye ita minamato. Zvirokwazvo, munamato unodzivirira kubva kuzvitadzo zvikuru uye nemabasa akaipa. Uye zvirokwazvo, Allah kukurangarirai (pamberi pengirozi) chinhu chikurusa (kudarika kuvarangarira kwenyu muminamato). Uye Allah vanoziva zvose zvamunoita

Uye musapokane nevanhu vegwaro (maJudha nemaKristu), kusara kwekuti zviri munzira iri nani (mashoko nenzira yakanaka kuvashevedzera kuIslaam), kusara kweavo vanoita zvakaipa kubva mavari. Uye taurai kuti (kwavari): “Tinotenda mune zvatakatumirwa nezvamakatumirwa, uye Mwari wedu naMwari wenyu mumwechete (Allah), uye kwavari tinozvipira (semaMuslim).”

Naizvozvo takatumira Gwaro (Qur’aan) kwauri (Muhammad (SAW)), uye avo vatakatumira magwaro (Torah neVhangeri) vanotenda mariri seavo avo vanemi (saAbdullah ibn Salaam). Uye hapana kana ani anoramba ndima dzedu kusara kweavo vasingatendi (muIslaam)
Uye hapana (Muhammad (SAW)) Gwaro rawakamboverenga mushure (me iri Qur’aan), kana kuti rawakambonyora neruoko rwako rwerudyi. Zvirokwazvo, dai wakambodaro, vatevedzeri vemanyepo vaisagutsikana (newe)

Asi ndima dzedu dziri pachena (dzinopa chimiro chamutumwa Muhammad (SAW) muTorah neVhangeri) dzakaiswa mumatundundu evanhu vakapiwa ruzivo (pakati pemaJudha nemaKristu). Uye hapana ani anoramba ndima dzedu kusara kwevaiti vemabasa akaipa
Uye vanoti: “Ko sei zviratidzo zvisina kudzikiswa kwaari kubva kuna Tenzi vake?” Taura: “Zviratidzo zvinongove naAllah chete, uye ini ndinongova muyambiri chete ari pachena.”
Havagutsikani here kuti takatumira Gwaro (Qur’aan) iro rinoverengwa kwavari? Zvirokwazvo, mazviri mune tsitsi neyambiro kune avo vanotenda

Taura (kwavari Muhammad (SAW)) kuti: “Allah ndivo vanogona kuve mupupuri pakati pangu nemi. Vanoziva zvose zviri muchadenga nepasi.” Uye avo vanotenda mumanyepo vasingatendi muhumwechete hwaAllah, ndivo vanhu vakarasikirwa

Uye vanokukumbira kuti ukurumidzise mutongo (kwavari), uye ingadai pasina nguva yakatarwa, zvirokwazvo, mutongo ungadai wakatosvika kwavari nechakare. Uye zvirokwazvo, uri kuzouya kwavari nenguva isipi ivo vakarivara
Vanokukumbira kuti ukurumidzise mutongo (kwavari), asi zvirokwazvo, moto weGehena uchavakomberedza ivo vasingatendi
Pazuva rokuti marwadzo achavambundira kubva kumusoro uye kusvikira pasi petsoka dzavo, uye zvichataurwa kwavari kuti: “Ravirai izvo zvamaiita.”
“Imi varanda vangu vanotenda! Zvirokwazvo, nyika yakakurisa. Naizvozvo namatai ini ndoga.”
Chinhu chose chicharavira rufu. Uye kwatiri muchadzoserwa

Uye avo vanotenda muhumwe hwaAllah, uye voita mabasa akanaka, zvirokwazvo, tichave tinovapa dzimba dzepamusoro kuParadhiso, kumucheto kwadzo pane nzizi dzinenge dzichierera, kuti vagaremo zvachose. Mubario mutsvene ndewe vasevenzi
Avo vanotsungirira, uye vovimba naTenzi vavo chete (Allah)
Uye zvisikwa zvizhinji hazvitakuri kudya kwazvo, asi Allah ndivo vanozvipa kudya pamwechete nemi. Uye ndivo vanonyatsonzwa, vanonyatso ziva
Uye kana ukavabvunza kuti: “Ndiyani akasika matenga nenyika pamwe nekusika zuva nemwedzi?” Chokwadi, vanopindura vachiti: “Allah.” Saka seiko vachirasika
Allah vanowedzera kudya nekuderedza kune uyo wavanoda kubva kuvaranda vavo. Zvirokwazvo, Allah ndivo muzivi wezvose

Uye kana ukavabvunza kuti: “Ndiyani anonaisa mvura kubva kumatenga, uye okonzera kuti nyika irarame mushure mekufa kwayo?” Naizvozvo vanopindura vachiti: “Allah.” Taura kuti: “Kurumbidzwa kwese nekutendwa kwese ndekwa Allah!” Asi vazhinji vavo havafunge
Uye hupenyu hwepasi pano ndewe kutamba uye nekunakidzwa! Zvirokwazvo, hupenyu huchatevera mushure mekutongwa ndiwo hupenyu (husina kana magumo), asi dai vaiziva

Uye kana vachipinda mungarava vanokumbira chengetedzo kubva kuna Allah, uye vachichenesa kutenda kwavo kuzviitira ivo chete. Asi kana vakaunzwa panyika mune zvakanaka, vanotanga kusanganisa Allah nezvimwewo pakunamata
Naizvozvo havatendi izvo zvatakavapa uye vanotonakidzwa, asi nenguva isipi vachazviziva

Uye havaoni here kuti takaita (Makkah) nzvimbo yakachengetedzeka, asi vanhu vazhinji vachibatwa (kana kuraiwa) munzvimbo dzakavakomberedza? Saka vanotenda here mumanyepo (zvimwe zvinamatwa kunze kwaAllah), uye vachiramba (kutenda) zvipo zvaAllah

Uye ndiani ane udzvanyiriri kupfuura uyo anotaura manyepo pamusoro paAllah kana kuramba chokwadi (Islaam) kana chichinge chauya kwaari? Nokudaro hapana here nzvimbo yekugara kumoto wekuGehena yeavo vasingatendi (muIslaam)
Uye avo vanoshanda (vanorwa) nesimba munzira yedu, zvirokwazvo, tichavatungamirira munzira dzedu (Islaam). Uye zvirokwazvo, Allah vane avo vanoita mabasa akanaka
Alif – Laam – Meem. (Mavara aya ndemamwe ezviratidzo zvaAllah, uye hapana kana ani anoziva zvaanoreva kusara kwavo)
MaRoma akurirwa
Munzvimbo yepadyo (Syria, Iraq, Jordan, nePalestine), uye mushure mekukurirwa vachazokunda
Mumakore matatu kusvika mapfumbamwe. Urongwa hwezvichazoitika nezvakaitika hunongove chete naAllah. Uye pazuva iroro vatendi (maMuslim) vachafara (nekukunda kwemaRoma achikunda Persia)
Kuburikidza nerubatsiro rwaAllah. Vanobatsira uyo wavanoda, uye ndivo samasimba, vane ngoni zhinji
Ivimbiso yaAllah (kuti vachaita maRoma akunde), uye Allah havatadze kubudirira pavimbiso yavo, asi vanhu vazhinji havazvizive
Vanongoziva chete zviri pachena zveupenyu hwepasi rino (kutsvaga raramo, kurima, kukohwa, nezvimwe zvakadaro). Uye zveupenyu hwemangwana vakatorivara

Vanombofungawo maererano ivo pachavo (nezvekusikwa kwavo here pasina kana chii zvacho, nekuti Allah vachazovamutsa)? Allah havana kusika matenga nenyika uye zviri mazviri kusara nechokwadi uye kwenguva yakatarwa. Asi zvirokwazvo vanhu vazhinji vanoramba kuti vachave vanosangana naTenzi vavo

Havambofamba here munyika vachionawo mhedzisiro yeavo vaivepo mumashure mavo? Vakange vaine masimba mazhinji kuvadarika ivo, uye vairima panyika, uye vakaigara vakawandisa zvokutopfuura izvo zvavari (ava vasingatendi). Uye kwavari kwakauya vatumwa vavo nehumboo hutsvene. Zvirokwazvo, Allah havana kuvadzvanyirira, asi ivo ndivo vega vaizvidzvanyirira
Huipi hwaive mhedzisiro yeavo vaiita mabasa akashata, nekuda kwekuti vakaramba ndima dzaAllah (humboo, zviratidzo nevatumwa) uye vaidzitsvinyira nekudzishora
Allah (voga) ndivo vakatanga kusika zvisikwa, uye vachazvidzokorora, uye kwavari ndiko kwamuchadzorerwa
Uye pazuva iro nguva ichasvika, avo vanoita mabasa akashata (vasingatendi nevatadzi) vachaparadzwa nekusurukirwa
Panenge pasina kana mumiririri kubva pane avo vavaisanganisa naAllah pakunamata. Uye vavaisanganisa naAllah vacharamba shamwari dzavo (kutenda kwavo mavari)
Pazuva iro nguva ichasvika (yekutongwa), pazuva iroro vanhu vachasiyana pamwe nekupatsanurana (Vatendi kwavo uye vasingatendi kwavo)
Avo vakatenda (muhumwe hwaAllah) zvekare vakaita mabasa akanaka, vachava muhupenyu hwakanaka zvachose uye vari mubindu remufaro (Paradhiso)
Uye avo vaisatenda, uye vakaramba zviratidzo zvedu, uye kusangana kwehupenyu hwemangana, vachakandwa mumarwadzo emumoto (wemuGehena)
Naizvozvo kurumbidzwa ngakuve kuna Allah, apo pamunopinda panguva dzemanheru (nekuita minamato yeMaghrib neIsha), nepanguva dzemangwanani (nekuita munamato weFajr)

Uye ndivo vane rumbidzo mumatenga nepanyika; uye panguva dzemasikati (nekuita munamato weAsr) nepanguva apo pamunopinda masikati (nekuita munamato weDhuhr). (Ibn Abbaas vakati: “Iyi ndiyo minamato mishanu inokomekedzwa pazuva vanhu vakaungana irikutaurwa muQur’aan).”
Vanoburitsa upenyu kubva kune chakafa, uye voburitsa chakafa kubva kune chipenyu. Uye vanomutsa nyika mushure mekufa kwayo. Uye ndiko kabuditsirwo (kamutsirwo) kamuchazoitwa
Uye kubva muzviratidzo zvavo ndezvekuti vakakusikai imi (Adam) kubva muvhu, (uye Hawwa (Evha) kubva mumbabvu yaAdam, uye vana vake kubva mumvura), uye, tarisai, muri vanhu varifararira

Uye kubva pazviratidzo zvavo vakave vanokusikirai madzimai kubva mamuri, kuti muwane kugutsikana mavari, uye vakaisa pakati penyu rudo uye tsitsi. Zvirokwazvo, mazviri mune micherechedzo kune avo vanhu vanofunga
Uye kubva pazviratidzo zvavo pane kusikwa kwematenga nenyika, uye musiyano wemitauro yenyu neruvara rwemitumbi yenyu. Zvirokwazvo, mazviri mune zviratidzo kuvanhu vane ruzivo rwakakwana
Uye kubva pazviratidzo zvavo pane kurara kwamunoita usiku uye panguva dzemasikati, uye nekutsvaga kwenyu zvimwe zvezvipo zvavo. Zvirokwazvo, mazviri mune zviratidzo kune avo vanhu vanoteerera

Uye kubva pazviratidzo zvavo vanokuratidzai mheni kuti mutye uye nekuvimba, uye vanonaisa mvura kubva kumatenga, uye vopeputsa nayo pasirino mushure mekufa kwaro. Zvirokwazvo, mazviri mune micherechedzo kuvanhu vanonzwisisa
Uye kubva pamicherechedzo yavo matenga nenyika zvinotevedzera mirairo yavo. Uye mushure mezvo vachakudanai kamwe, naizvozvo muchabuda kubva pasi (kubva mumakuva kuzotongwa)
Ndivo muridzi hwechose chiri mumatenga nepanyika. Uye zvese zvinovateerera

Uye ndivo vakasika zvisikwa kwekutanga, uye vachazvisika zvekare (mushure mekuparadzwa kwazvo), uye izvi zviri nyore kwavari. Ndivo vane mucherechedzo hwepamusoro mumatenga nenyika (hapana chimwe chinhu chinofanirwa kunamatwa kusara kwavo, uye hapana chakafanana navo). Uye ndivo samasimba, vane ungwaru hwese

Uye vanokupai muenzaniso kubva kwamuri. Mune here vabatsiri kubva pavaranda venyu vekudyidzana navo zvakafanira paupfumi uyo watakakupai, uye vamunotya sokutya kwamunoita vamwe? Kudaro tinotsanangurira zviratidzo zvizere avo vanhu vanonzwisisa
Asi avo vanoita mabasa akaipa vanotevedzera zvido zvavo vasina ruzivo. Ko! Pane here anozokwanisa kutungamirira uyo Allah vanenge vaburitsa mugwara rakanaka? Uye vachange vasina kana vabatsiri

Naizvozvo, taridza (Muhammad (SAW)) chiso chako kuchitendero (cheIslaam) wova Haneef (uyo asinganamati chimwe chinhu kusara kwaAllah). Chitendero chaAllah, icho vakasikira vanhu. Pasave neshanduko pachitendero chaAllah. Ichi ndicho chitendero chakatwasuka, asi vanhu vazhinji havazvizivi
Uye (rambai) muchikumbira ruregerero kwavari chete, uye vatyei muchitevedzera zvekare mirairo yavo, uye itai Swalaah (Namatai), uye musava pakati peavo vanonamata zvidhori
Kune avo vanosiya chitendero chavo cheIslaam vovamumapoka (vachiunza zvinhu zvitsva (Bid’ah) uye vachitevedzera zvido zvavo), rimwe nerimwe boka richifara nezvarinazvo

Uye kana vanhu vakawirwa nedambudziko, zvirokwazvo vanochemera kuna Tenzi vavo (Allah) vachikumbira ruregerero kubva kwavari. Asi kana Allah vakavaratidza nekuvaravidzisa nyasha dzavo, aiwa, chimwe chikwata chavo chinotobva chasanganisa Tenzi vavo nezvimwe zvinamatwa
Kuti vasakwanise kutenda zvipo zvatakavapa. Uye chimbofarai (kwekanguva kadiki), asi nenguva isipi muchazviziva
Kana kuti takavadzikisira mutemo (Gwaro), uyo unotaura maererano neizvo vaivasanganisa nazvo (Allah)
Uye tikaita kuti vanhu vave vanoravira tsitsi vanobva vafara nadzo; asi matambudziko akaipa akavawira nekuda kwezvakavaita nemaoko avo, aiwa, vanobva vashaya tarisiro
Asi havaoni here kuti Allah vanopamhidzira raramo zhinji kune uyo wavanoda uye kuderedza? Zvirokwazvo, mazviri mune micherechedzo kune avo vanhu vanotenda
Saka ipa hama kodzero dzake, anoshaya uye munhu ariparwendo. Izvi ndozvinhu zvitsvene kune avo vanotsvaga nyasha dzaAllah; uye ndivo vachange vakabudirira

Uye kune izvo zvamunopa sezvipo kune vamwe nechinangwa chekuti zviwedzerwe kubva pazvinhu zvevamwe vanhu, chokwadi kuna Allah hazviwedzerwi huwandu. Asi kune izvo zvamunopa seZakaah (zvipo kuvarombo) muchitsvaga nyasha dzaAllah, aiwa, vanodaro vachawana kupamhidzirwa kwakakura

Allah ndivo vakakusikai, vakakupai kudya, uye vachakuitai kuti mufe, zvekare vokupai hupenyu (Pazuva rekutongwa). Kune here vamunoti vabatsiri venyu kuna Allah vangakwanise kuita zvakadaro? Kukudzwa kwese ndekwavo! Uye kurumbidzwa kwose ndekwavo pamusoro pezvose zvavanovasanganisa (navo)
Zvivi zvakauya pano pasi uye nemumakungwa nekuda kwezvinoitwa nevanhu, kuti ivo (Allah) vavaravidzise chidimbu chezvavaiita, kuti vave vanodzokera (kururegerero netsitsi dzaAllah)
Taura (iwe Muhammad (SAW)) kuti: “Fambai munyika uye moona magumo eavo vaive mumashure menyu! Vazhinji vavo vaiva maMushrikoon (Avo vanonamata zvimwe zvinhu vachizvisanganisa naAllah).”

Saka taridza (iwe Muhammad (SAW)) chiso chako kunzira yakatwasuka uye nechitendero chechokwadi (Islaam), kusati kwauya zuva iro risina kana angarimisa kubva kuna Allah. Zuva racho vanhu vachapatsanurwa (mapoka maviri, rimwe boka kuParadhiso uye rimwe kuGehena)
Uyo asingatendi acharwadzisirwa kusatenda kwake. Asi uyo anoita mabasa akanaka, vakadaro vanenge vachizvigadzirira nzvimbo yavo yakanaka (kuParadhiso)
Kuti vave vanobhadhara avo vanotenda (muhumwechete hwaAllah) uye nokuita mabasa akanaka kubva mumakomborero avo. Zvirokwazvo, (Allah) havafarire avo vasingatendi

Uye kubva muzviratidzo zvavo vanotumira mhepo dzichiunza mufaro, vokuravidzisai tsitsi dzavo (mvura), uye kuti ngarava dzifambe kuburikidza nemurawo wavo, kuti mutsvage makomborero avo, uye kuti muve vanhu vanopa kutenda

Uye zvirokwazvo takave tinotumira vatumwa kuvanhu vavo mushure mako (Muhammad (SAW)). Vakaenda kwavari nemicherechedzo iri pachena, uye tikatsiva kune avo vaiita zvakaipa (kusatenda nezvimwe zvitadzo). Uye kuvatendi zvakave zvinokomekedzwa kwatiri kuvabatsira

Allah ndivo vanotumira mhepo kuti ihwidze makore, uye kumaparadzira muchadenga nekuda kwavo, uye kumapatsanura muzvidimbu kusvikira maona madonhwe emvura kubva pakati pavo! Kana vachinge vaita kuti adonhe kune uyo wavanoda pavaranda vavo nekuda kwavo, vanova vanofara
Uye muzvirokwazvo mushure mayo (mvura), mushure isati yatumidzwa kwavari, vaive vasina tarisiro
Tarisa uone magumo etsitsi dzaAllah, mumutsiro avanoita ivhu mushure mekufa kwaro. Zvirokwazvo, vachamutsa vafi (pazuva rekumutswa), uye vanokwanisa kuita zvose
Uye zvirokwazvo kana tikatumira mhepo (inoparadza zvirimwa), uye vozviona zvaoma, aiwa, vanova mushure mezvo (mushure mekufara) vasingatendi (Tenzi vavo)
Saka muzvirokwazvo iwe (Muhammad (SAW)) haungambokwanisa kuti vafi (vasingatendi) namatsi vakwanise kunzwa kushevedzwa apo vanenge vafuratira vachienda
Uye iwe (Muhammad (SAW)) haungambotungamire mapofu kubva mukurasika kwavo, asi unongokwanisa chete kuita kuti avo vanotenda mumicherechedzo yedu vanzwe, uye vanozvipira kuna Allah muIslaam

Allah ndivo vakakusikai mune urwere (musina simba), vakakupai simba mushure mekushaiwa simba, uye mushure mesimba vakakupai kushaiwa simba pamwe nevhudzi jena. Vanosika izvo zvavanoda, uye vane ruzivo, nemasimba ezvose
Pazuva iro nguva ichavepo (Qiyaamah), avo vanoita zvisakarurama vachapika vachiti havana kumbogara (panyika) kusara kwekanguva kadiki. Naizvozvo vakave nekudzimaidzwa (kubva kuchokwadi)

Uye avo vakapihwa ruzivo pamwe nekutenda vachati: “Zvirokwazvo, makagara sekutara nekunyorerwa kwamainge maitwa naAllah kusvikira pazuva rekumutswa. Saka iri ndiro zuva rekumutswa, asi imi makange musingazvizive.”
Saka zuva iroro kukumbira kwavo hakusi kuzombobatsira avo vaiita mabasa asakarurama, uye havasi kuzombobvumidzwa kudzokera kuti vave vanofadza Allah (nekutenda nekuita mabasa akanaka)

Uye zvirokwazvo takave tinotsanangura kuvanhu micherechedzo yose mugwaro iri (Qur’aan). Asi iwe (Muhammad (SAW)) kana ukavaunzira micherechedzo iyi kana humboo, muzvirokwazvo avo vasingatendi vachati (kune avo vanotenda): “Hapana chamurikutevedzera kusara kwemanyepo pamwe nemapipi.”
Saizvozvo Allah vanovhara moyo yeavo vasingazive (humboo hwehumwechete hwaAllah)
Saka tsungirira (iwe Muhammad (SAW)). Zvirokwazvo, vimbiso yaAllah ndeyechokwadi; uye usave unoshungurudzika (unodzikisirwa) neavo vasingade kutenda
Alif – Laam – Meem. (Mavara aya ndemamwe ezviratidzo zvaAllah zviri muQur’aan, uye hapana anoziva zvaanoreva kusara kwaAllah)
Idzi ndidzo ndima dzegwaro rehungwaru (Qu’aan)
Nhungamiriri netsitsi kuvanhu vanoita mabasa akanaka
Avo vanoita Swalaah (Munamato) uye vachipa Zakaah (Zvipo kuvarombo) pamwe nekutenda muzvirokwazvo muupenyu hwamangwana
Avo vari mugwara raTenzi vavo, uye ndivo vakabudirira

Uye kubva muvanhu pane uyo anozvitsvagira mitauro isina kana nematuro (Kuimba, nziyo, nezvimwe zvakadaro) kuti atsaudzire vanhu kubva munzira yaAllah asina kana neruzivo, uye anotsvinyira (nzira yaAllah kana ndima dzemuQur’aan). Avo kwavari kuchave nemutongo unonyadzisa (mugomba remoto)

Uye kana ndima (dzeQur’aan) dzikave dzinoverengwa kwaari, anodzitendeukira nekudzifuratira mukuzvikudza nekuzvitutumadza, sekunge asingambodzinzwe, sekunge asinganzwi nenzeve. Saka mutaurire maererano nezvemarwadzo akaoma
Zvirokwazvo, avo vanotenda (muIslaam) uye nekuita mabasa akarurama, vachawana mapindu eraramo inoyevedza (Paradhiso)
Kuti vagare maari. Uye vimbiso yaAllah ndeyechowadi. Uye ndivo samasimba, vane ungwaru hwose

Vakave vanosika matenga pasina kana mitsigo yamunoona, uye vakave vanodzikinura makomo kuitira kuti pasi rino risandengendeke nemi. Uye vakave vanoparadzira mariri mhuka dzakasiya siyana dzinofamba. Uye tikave tinotumira mvura (yekunaya) kubva mumatenga, uye tikaita kuti (zvirimwa) zvakasiyana-siyana zvikure mariri
Izvi ndizvo zvisikwa zvaAllah. Saka nditaridzei izvo zvakasikwa (nevamunoti vanamwari) vasiri ivo. Asi avo vasingatendi vakarasika zviri pachena

Uye takave tinopa Luqmaan uchenjeri (nenzwisiso yechitendero) tichiti: “Ipa kutenda kuna Allah.” Uye uyo anopa kutenda kuna Allah, anopa kutenda (kunomubatsira) pachezvake. Uye uyo asingatendi kuna Allah, aiwa, zvirokwazvo Allah vakapfuma, vanerukudzo rwose

Uye (rangarirai) apo Luqmaan achiraira mwanakoma wake akati: “Iwe mwanakomana wangu! Usave unosanganisa zvimwe zvinamatwa naAllah, nekuti muzvirokwazvo Shirk (Kusanganisa nezvimwe zvinamatwa) chinhu chakaipa zvikuru.”

Uye takave tinokomekedza kumunhu kuti (ave nerukudzo) kuvabereki vake. Amai vake vakave nekumutakura muurwere nemumatambudziko pamusoro peurwere nematambudziko, uye kumuyamwisa (nekubvisa pazamu) kwemakore maviri. Nokudaro ipai kutenda kwandiri nekuvabereki venyu. Kwandiri ndiko chete kune magumo

Asi vakakumanikidza kusanganisa zvimwe zvinamatwa neni izvo usina ruzivo nazvo, saka usave unovatevedzera; asi gara navo mune zvakanaka panyika, zvekare wotevedzera nzira yeuyo anokumbira ruregerero rwangu murukudzo. Uye kwandiri muchadzoka, ndove ndinokuudzai izvo zvamaiita

“Iwe mwanakomana wangu! Kana paine (chimwe chinhu) chakaenzana neshanga remhodzi muuremu, uye kunyangwe riri mudombo, mumatenga kana pasi, Allah vachariburitsa pachena. Zvirokwazvo, Allah vanokwanisa (kuburitsa), uye vanoziva zvose.”

“Iwe mwanakomana wangu! Ita Swalaah (Namata), uye wokurudzira vamwe kuita mabasa akanaka, uye wodzivisa (vanhu) kuita zvisakarurama, zvekare wotsungirira pane zvose zvichakuwana. Zvirokwazvo, iyi ndeimwe yemitemo yakakosha (yakakomekedzwa naAllah).”
“Uye usave unotendeukira vanhu mukuzvikudza, kana kufamba uchizvidhonza (uchizvitutumadza) panyika. Zvirokwazvo, Allah havade munhu anozvikudza nekuzvitutumadza.”
“Uye famba zvinemutsigo, zvekare dzikisa izwi rako (pakutaura). Zvirokwazvo, izwi rakazhandukira pamazwi ose kuchema kwembongoro.”

Hamuone here kuti Allah vakaita kuti zviri mumatenga nepanyika zvive pasi penyu, uye vakazadzisa uye vakakupai ropafadzo dzavo (dzose) dzinoonekwa (Islaam, Upfumi, Utano nezwimwe zvakadaro) nedzisingaonekwi (Kutenda kuna Allah, Ungwaru, Ruzivo nezvimwe zvakadaro) (kuti mudzishandise)? Asi kubva muvanhu mune avo vanopokana pamusoro paAllah vasina ruzivo, kana nhungamiro, kana gwaro zvaro rinopa chaedza

Uye kana zvikataurwa kwavari kuti: “Teverai izvo zvakadzikiswa naAllah”, vanobva vati: “Aiwa! Tinotevedzera izvo takawana madzitateguru edu (achitevedzera).” (Vachaiita kudaro) kunyangwe zvazvo (Satani) achivadavidza kumarwado emoto

Uye uyo munhu anenge azvipira kuna Allah, achiita mabasa akarurama, anenge atobatirira chimubato chakavimbika (Laa ilaaha illallaah (Hakuna chimwe chinhu chine kodzero yekunamatwa kusara kwaAllah)). Uye kuna Allah ndiko kunodzokera mhereredzo yose

Uye uyo anenge asingatendi, kusatenda kwake kusakushungurudze (Muhammad (SAW)). Kwatiri ndokwavachadzokera, uye tovataurira maererano neizvo zvavaiita. Zvirokwazvo, Allah vanoziva zvikuru zviri muhana
Tinovasiya kuti vafare zvishoma, uye mumagumo avo tichavasungira kuti vapinde mumurango mukuru

Uye kana iwe (Muhammad (SAW)) ukavabvunza: “Ndiyani akasika matenga nenyika,” zvirokwazvo vachakupindura kuti: “Allah.” Taura: “Kurumbidzwa kwose nekutendwa ngazvive kuna Allah!” Asi vazhinji vavo havazvizivi
Allah ndivo muridzi wezvose zviri mumatenga uye nepasi. Zvirokwazvo, Allah, ndivo mupfumi, vane kodzero yekurumbidzwa

Uye dai miti yose iri panyika yaiva zvinyoreso, uye gungwa (riri ingi yekunyoresa), kusanganisira makungwa manomwe ari mumashure achidira mariri, asi mashoko aAllah haapfuudzike. Zvirokwazvo, Allah ndivo samasimba, uye vane ungwaru hwose
Kusikwa kwenyu uye nekumutswa kwenyu mose kwakangofanana nekusika munhu mumwe chete nekumumutsa. Zvirokwazvo, Allah ndivo munzwi wezvose, muoni wezvose

Hauoni here (Muhammad (SAW)) kuti Allah ndivo vanoita kuti usiku upinde muzuva, uye zuva ripinde muusiku, uye vakasika zuva nemwedzi, chimwe nechimwe chichifamba nenguva yakatarwa; uye kuti Allah vanoziva zvose zvamunoita
Nemhaka yekuti Allah ndivo vechokwadi, uye zvimwe zvose zvavanosheedza kusiya kwaivo, chokwadi, manyepo; uye kuti Allah ndivo vari pamusoro, ndivo mukuru
Hauoni here kuti ngarava dzinofamba mumakungwa nekuda kwetsitsi dzaAllah kuti vave vanokutaridzai micherechedzo yavo? Zvirokwazvo, mazviri mune micherechedzo kune uyo anotsungirira achipa kutenda

Uye kana vakakomberedzwa nemasai-sai kunge mumvuri, vanokumbira kuna Allah, vachikumbira kwavari ivo chete. Asi kana vaunzwa panyika yakanaka, mavari mune avo vanomira pakati (pekutenda nekusatenda). Asi hapana anoramba micherechedzo yedu kusara kweuyo asina moyo wekutenda

Imi vanhu! Ityai Allah Tenzi venyu, uye ityai iro zuva apo baba vanenge vasingakwanise kubatsira mwanakomana wavo, kana mwanakomana kubatsira baba vake. Zvirokwazvo, vimbiso yaAllah ndeyechokwadi. Musave munonyengedzwa nehupenyu hwanhasi, kana mambo wevanyengedzi (Satani) ave anokunyengedzai pamusoro paAllah

Zvirokwazvo, Allah vega ndivo vane ruzivo rwenguva. Vanotumidza mvura, uye vanoziva zviri mumimba (dzana amai). Uye hapana anoziva zvaachawana mangwana, uye hapana anoziva uko kwaachafira. Zvirokwazvo, Allah ndivo vanoziva zvizere (zvinhu zvose)
Alif – Laam – Meem. (Mavara aya ndemamwe ezviratidzo zvaAllah zviri muQur’aan, uye hapana anoziva zvaanoreva kusara kwavo)
Kudzikinurwa kweGwaro (Qur’aan) iro mariri musina kusagutsikana kubva kunaTenzi vepasi rino (vanhu, maJinn nezvese zvirimo)

Kana kuti vanoti: “(Muhammd (SAW)) azvigadzirira pachake?” Kwete! Ichokwadi kubva kuna Tenzi vako, kuti uyambire avo vanhu vasati vamboshanyirwa nemuyambiri mumashure kwako, kuitira kuti vave vanhu vakatungamirirwa

Allah ndivo vakasika matenga nepasi pano, uye nezvose zviri mukati pamazuva matanhatu, ndokusimuka vachienda pamusoro pechigaro chavo cheumambo (nenzira inofanira humambo hwavo). Kwamuri imi vanhu hakuna kana anokwanisa kuita semubatsiri, muchengetedzi kana mumiriri kusara kwavo (Allah). Ko hamusimbozvirangarirawo here

Ndivo vanokwanisa kutanga uye kupedzesa hurongwa kubva mumatenga kusvika pano pasi. Zvekare hurongwa hwese hunodzokera kwavari pazuva rimwe, rakaenzana nemakore chiuru sekuverenga kwamunoita (makore panyika)
Ndivo vanoziva zvose zvakavandika uye nezviri pachena, samasimba, vane nyasha zhinji
Ndivo vakasika zvinhu zvose mune zvakanaka uye vakasika munhu kubva muvhu
Ndokubva vasika vana vake kubva mumvura yomunosema (mvura kubva mukusangana kwevanhurume pamwe nevanhukadzi)
Zvekare vakave vanomuumba mune zvakanaka, uye vakafemera mweya (wavakagadzira) maari; uye vakakupai nzeve, maziso pamwe nemoyo. Asi munotenda zvishoma
Uye vanobvunza kuti: “Kana tichinge taora muivhu (tafa), zvirokwazvo tinozosikwa patsva zvekare here?” Asi vanoramba kuti vachasangana naTenzi vavo
Taura kuti: “Iyo ngirozi yerufu yamakatarirwa ichave inotora upenyu hwenyu. Uye muchave munounzwa pamberi paTenzi venyu.”
